job_lists.title: Systems Engineer( (This position is for NI's subsidiary Micropross)
job_lists.company: 美商_國家儀器股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
About Micropross
Established in 1979, Micropross is the leading company in the supply of test solutions for RFID, smartcart and Near Field Communication (NFC). The company is driven by a spirit of innovation and dedication to customer care.
Micropross has proven expertise in the design of laboratory and manufacturing test tools which are considered as references in their domains. These tools allow users to fully characterize and test the electrical and protocol performance of products such as smartcards and smartphones in design, conformance and production.
In late 2015, National Instruments acquired Micropross, this acqusition is key in placing NI as a leader in wireless test, rounding out our wireless standards coverage to include a full hardware and software solution for Near Field Communication and Wireless Charging. It will also strengthen Micropross ability to invest, compete and win in large scale production opportunities while allowing them to accelerate their development and strengthen their leadership position in NFC and Wireless Charging

Position Overview and Responsibilities 
Micropross(MP), a National Instruments Company has an immediate opening for a talented, experienced Field Technical Resource, in the (location – NI Office Taipei).
As an MP Field Technical Resource, you will work for the leading supplier of test equipment in Near Field Communicatoins (NFC), contact & contactless payment, RFID and Wireless Power areas.  This is a technical, yet also highly collaborative role where you will work closely with both the Micropross and NI sales teams.  This may include working on large opportunities across your territory, as well as focusing on platform proficiency and adoption efforts at top tier accounts. 

Responsibilities 
- Work closely with the MP and NI Field Sales in team selling engagements, to accelerate the qualification (go/no-go decision) process and drive selected opportunities to tech close
- Analyze customer application requirements for completeness and provide insight into the technical complexity of the task
- Advanced support of large system customers to ensure customer success utilizing MP tools
- Configuration of MP systems and software architecture to meet customer application needs 
- Complete performance benchmarks and prove application concepts on MP tools using Micropross MPManager, the Micropross API or NI LabVIEW and NI TestStand
- Perform competitive analysis of MP products to competitor products
- Engage in training and support of NI Alliance Members and Integrators
- Develop software proof of concepts and reuse content, etc.
- Provide consulting services such as application start-up assistance, system installation, and bring up deployment support both remote and on-site at a customer facility
- Travel to support various customers across a geographic region
- Demonstrate professionalism as you are working in a customer-facing role
- Providing oral or written feedback to marketing and R&D on our products, competitor’s products, and third party products
job_lists.other_condition:
- Native Chinese language
- Taiwanese citizenship
- Bachelors in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or Computer Science
- 2+ years of general programming experience, NI LabVIEW preferred
- 2+ years in a customer-facing role
- Flexibility – adaptable to changing responsibilities, availability to travel
- Strong presentation, demonstration, and project management skills
- Self-management – ability to drive tasks to completion with little or no supervision 
- Organization – ability to prioritize time and coordinate with others to achieve effective results 
- Team orientation – ability to influence others without control
- English Language Competency and effective oral and written communication skills – clearly and concisely communicate in English so that persons and customers you work with can understand you clearly, particularly in technical conversations

台積電設備相關軟體開發
主要為負責機器視覺圖像識別、檢測、量測系統的程式開發與設計、程式除錯診斷，以及協助與支援服務工程人員進行設備軟體調整或設定。

6.具備汽、機車駕照。
福利與待遇:

2.固定薪資12個月，年終獎金一個月。
3.獎金: 依據公司獲利程度、員工個人績效及目標達成率決定獎金發放金額。
4.勞保、健保。
5.員工聚餐。
6.薪資依工作經驗起薪，有機器視覺實務經驗者優先待優錄取。

job_lists.title: 新大軟體研發工程師
job_lists.company: TTI_智同科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
我們希望能有一些剛畢業的有志青年加入我們的軟體開發工作，雖然不需要工作經驗，但是希望程式語言(特別是C語言)要強，對於作業系統有一定的。

由於公司內的軟體開發，種類繁多，工作與專長各有有不同，希望應徵者，能看一下這些工作的程式語言專長，在應徵時，說明有興趣的主題。如果有機會面談，再決定適合哪項工作? 
1. Server端的程式，程式語言的使用包含C# 與 PHP，此外也要會DHTML/JavaScript。
2. Linux平台: 就是用C語言寫程式。
3. Apps: Android (Java), iOS(Objective-C), Windows APPS (DHTML, C#)。
job_lists.other_condition:
這個職缺主要是開放給剛剛由學校畢業的同學，是要以寫程式為短期發展目標的求職者應徵。
本工作錄取之後，需要依照工作表現與學習進度，試用三至一年。完成試用後，會重新敘薪。

job_lists.title: Linux 與 Android TV 平台軟體研發工程師
job_lists.company: TTI_智同科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
負責平台軟體的移植與開發工作
1.依照硬體規格，安裝Bootloader，啟動作業系統到Set-top Box板子上。
2.移植Linux, Android TV 6.x 與 RDK 平台軟體到Set-top Box上。
3.移植OPEN SOURCE的軟體到Set-top Box上。
4.對於移植結果進行功能驗證與簡單的修改。
5.Release 軟體給其他部門，並協助解決問題。
6.必要的時候提供與硬體相關的底層程式(HAL) API給Android上層呼叫。
7.Linux Kernel與runtime環境做最佳化處理，以節省記憶體與儲存空間。
8.由於產品賣到國外去，需要與外國公司或客戶協同工作，所以基本英文能力需要具備。
9.必要時支援產品的測試程式的開發。
10.支援DirectFB, QT, Gstreamer, Webkit的移植。
11. PlayReady/Widvine DRM的Enable。
12.針對本公司硬體產品，提供SDK給客戶進行軟體開發。
job_lists.other_condition:
此工作仍然需要精通C 語言，需要進行簡單的考試(但用OPEN BOOK)，要考60分(總分100分)，才會進行面試。
本工作錄取之後，需要試用三至六個月，試用完成，會依照試用期表現，重新敘薪。

job_lists.title: Linux程式設計師(HAL)
job_lists.company: TTI_智同科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
有應徵者面談時問我，不是外銷業務才要出國嗎? 軟體工程師也要出國? 沒錯，這工作由於常要與國外客戶的Partners合作開發軟體，所以出國去駐點整合程式與解決BUG，成為常態性的工作。但也不是會寫程式就能去，會要講點技術英文，要寫點英文文件，英文還在學習階段的，就只能在需要帶助手的時候跟者去。不過出國工作也很辛苦的，別人童常在等你的工作結果，還要一天當兩天用來工作，外國人放假的時候，你還要辛苦地去考察當地風土人情。

主要於Linux平台，開發IPTV/VOD/DLNA的相關軟體API硬體或作業系統層的服務，這些API將提供給STB上層軟體使用，這工作將會學習到:
- Linuxl核心系統架構與SYSTEM CALL的使用。
- 高階程式語言技巧。
- Video and Audio decoding (包含H.264, HEVC, Dolby Digital 等解碼技術)。
- Recording, Time-Shift, Place-shift等等專業程式控制技巧。
- CAS/DRM design (2048 bit HIGH-SECURITY, RSA, PKI, etc)
- Graphics (2D/3D)
- Networking (Wi-Fi, LTE, Bluetooth, NFC, Power line, ...)
- Others

使用Linux開發環境，主要程式語言為C，會C++更好。

產品的使用者目前是國內外各大電信公司，同時與國外軟體大廠合作，因此工作上常會有與外國客戶溝通的必要性，良好的英文能力有助於此工作的發揮。如果語言與專業能力OK，也會依專案需要派駐國外與客戶一起工作的機會。
job_lists.other_condition:
此工作需要精通C 語言，熟Linux，但無法接受，您進來了才開始學基本的C，所以要進行簡單的C語言筆試(筆試是採用OPEN BOOK，請攜帶常用的C語言教材、課本或筆記做為參考)，要考60分以上，才會安排主管面談。如果對於C語言一無所知，或只有看看書，沒有寫過程式，建議不要來試驗。未來工作的時候，C++要能看得懂。
本工作錄取之後，需要試用三至六個月，同仁於轉為正式員工時，會依照試用期表現，重新敘薪。

● Digital signal processing expertise (digital filtering, echo cancellation, speech recognition)

job_lists.company: 新加坡商立可人事顧問有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
公司簡介:
公司為全球知名美商IC Design House.
位於新竹公道五路上.
目前專案為iOT物聯網, 主要針對智慧城市與智慧家居市場, 範疇遍布亞洲: 台灣/日本/韓國/香港...等等.
去年年底併購了一家大型美商車用電子公司, 在車聯網的部分也在建構的範疇中.
如果你對全球領先技術有強大的好奇心與熱忱, 這裡是你最好選擇!

工作環境與福利:
薪資以年薪的方式核薪, 12個月發放, 所以比起台灣大廠20月的發薪方式, 
在這裡你的月薪會直接提高近兩倍的數字. 付出一個月的努力與貢獻, 就能得到一個月的報酬, 不用等到年底才能領獎金.

聘僱方式:
約聘制, 會先簽到九月或者一年一簽, 最多兩年的時間.
因為是長期需求, 所以如果表現良好, 續約及轉正職的機率很高.
因為此公司正職的機會非常難申請且名額有限, 萬中選一; 所以此機會的好處是, 搶先加入, 能比其他人更有機會轉為正式員工!

招募以下職位, 若您在校論文和此領域相關, 對以下職缺感興趣, 都歡迎投遞履歷.
我們會再直接跟您介紹更詳細的內容!
1. Software Engineer
● support IOT products for customer projects, also co-work with internal cross-geo engineering team to investigate and solve customer issues. 
● support new business engagements and do on-site customer/lab visit to resolve customer issues. 

Requirement:
● Familiar with WiFi 802.11a/b/g/n/ac protocol and infrastructure is preferred.
● Familiar with Embedded Linux/Linux Android/OpenWRT is a plus. 

2. System Engineer
● Chip bring up, system parameter (registers) optimization, performance (throughput) tuning.

Requirement:
● Experienced in communications (WiFi or BT) system 
● Familiar with PCI, PCIE, USB, or SDIO interface, with capability to debug platform compatibility issue (Nice to have) 
● Antenna design 
● Support FPGA verification

SoLoMo 目前主要產品為「巷弄」，是個美食 O2O 服務，強調當天買當天使用。獨特的商業模式讓巷弄至今擴展全台6個縣市，未來更希望能進軍海外市場。

我們需要你有一顆好奇心，看到別人作品會好奇他是如何做到的，如果套用在自身的產品上會不會發生什麼有趣的事情？

我們需要您有基本但完整的App開發經驗，在產品開發流程中能夠發揮自已的想法和創意與團隊合作。

我們需要你有不斷求新求變求好的精神，設計或想出更好的 Design Pattern。

我們需要你有基本的 CS Foundation，能夠有效從容的解決基礎問題

我們需要您有基本的UI/UX概念，能夠不斷為使用者著想，每次的改版都會更貼近真實。

我們需要您有團隊合作的精神，一個人走得快，但唯有團隊合作才能走得更長遠。

我們需要您是個主動的人，主動了解新技術、主動與團隊溝通、主動做好任何一件你覺得可以更好的事。

job_lists.content: A. 執行工作流程(WDM)類相關之資訊化解決方案建置與維護。包含1. 電子表單、公文系統、電子文件管理系統等評估引進系統之日常維護，及新表單、流程、功能之開發及修改。2. 資訊處服務平台系統(Help Desk)、車輛管理系統(VMS)、文宣品管理系統(SBMS)等自行開發系統之日常維護，及新功能之開發及修改。3. 處理及解決公司內部使用者對於上述系統報修之問題。4. 了解公司內部業務單位提出之需求以進行上述系統功能新增與修改。B. 部、課內專案開發建置之人力及技術支援。C. 完成應用系統部、課級主管交辦事項。
job_lists.other_condition: 1. 具有網頁及資料庫應用系統開發及維護經驗(Java,JSP; 兼具.Net開發經驗更好)，有系統分析設計經驗者尤佳。2. 具有3年以上相關工作經驗。

job_lists.title: 應用系統工程師-本公司提供高鐵通勤協助
job_lists.company: 高鐵_台灣高速鐵路股份有限公司
job_lists.content: A. 針對資訊處應用系統部、課級單位主管所交付之專案、計劃或專題，落實評估、建議、規劃、執行與管理各階段工作細節。B. 針對資訊處應用系統部所負責維護之系統，進行版本升級、新增功能開發建置、以及其他相關日常維護工作之執行事宜。C. 規劃自我發展與落實紀律管理。D. 執行權責與交辦之行政作業。
job_lists.other_condition: 1. 具有以JAVA程式語言開發維護應用系統3年以上之經驗，熟J2EE、Struts、Spring、JQuery、Ajax等技術。2. 具系統分析設計能力，有專案管理實務經驗者尤佳。3. 責任心強,學習能力佳,具良好溝通能力可配合團隊運作。4. 資訊處工作地點為桃園青埔站旁，本公司提供高鐵通勤協助，歡迎各縣市菁英加入。

job_lists.title: 資訊技術管理師(負責系統管理)
job_lists.company: 高鐵_台灣高速鐵路股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 1.負責資訊服務系統的基礎環境建置、安裝設定與維護等工作。2.負責資訊服務系統的使用管理、效能監控和維護更新等規劃工作。3.負責資訊服務資料備份、回復與DR之規劃與相關監督評估等管理工作。4.負責規劃與導入系統各項系統作業簡化及自動化機制。5.負責資訊服務系統維護合約簽訂及更新等工作。6.支援專案之相關軟硬體基礎環境評估、建置等工作。7.負責確認機房管理之資訊設備硬體的維護管理等工作狀態。8.負責確認備份/回復、Archive等機房例行作業，與相關媒體/標籤之維護管理等工作狀態。9.上述作業所有必須之管理及操作文件的制訂、管理及定期更新等工作。
job_lists.other_condition: 具五年以上主機、SAN、備份、虛擬環境管理及系統作業自動化經驗。

job_lists.title: 嵌入式韌體工程師
job_lists.company: 嚮樂科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
工作內容:

本工作將有機會接觸到各式以 ARM Linux 爲基礎的工控產品, 從 L2/L3 switch 到 WLAN AP,  
上面搭載各式最新工控規格ex. IEEE 1588, IEC-62439, 你將有機會與硬體工程師以及 protocol developer 協同合作, 將功能整合進實際產品. 

你將被賦予主要工作

* 整合合校調 linux system, 從 kernel 到所有 user space 程式.
* 規劃與整合 filesystem image, 決定置入或移除元件.
* 驗證新製硬體.
* 測試與編譯 3rd party or open source 軟體.
* 分析系統資源與加強系統穩定性與效率. 


應徵條件:
* 精通熟練 C programming
* 熟悉 UNIX 操作與 shell script
* 熟悉 Embedded linux 常見子系統 MTD, uboot, squashfs, I2C, SPI, GPIO 等等
* 有能力自行 build Linux kernel and filesystem image
* 有能力自行 cross-compile linux driver 以及 user space application

加分項目:
* 有 github 帳號與活躍專案可供參考
* 曾修改過 opensource 軟體符合客制需求.(請詳列名稱與修改內容)
* 任何單晶片(uCon) programming經驗.
* 精通熟悉 OpenWRT 先進功能 ex. VPN or Captive portal, 瞭解如何以UCI 設定, 以及該功能底層所使用的元件.
job_lists.other_condition:
認真、有責任感、願意學習更多知識。
需有英文能力，能自行研讀英文技術文件，協助導入解決方案
能快速學習並運用新技術者尤佳
積極樂觀，能溝通，習慣團體合作

job_lists.title: Sr. App Developer ／資深APP開發工程師
job_lists.company: 訊連科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 我們團隊的信念是希望開發出來的成品，不只是在App Store裡如星河裡的一顆星，而是暗黑夜空中最閃亮的那顆彗星對此，我相信作出一個成品只是個開始，但讓我們作品像小孩般成長茁壯，是我們最重要的責任我們在作的事情1. 成長駭客 (Growth Hacking): 我們的APP兩年內在Google Play影像類別裡全球排名第四，全球累積超過4千萬下載量，超過4.5顆星高度評價。2. 資料探勘 (Data Mining): 透過資料探勘分析，在海量資料裡找出每個下載我們App的人最喜愛的功能，並找出提高我們產品的IAP轉換率的最佳方法，讓我們APP營收在短短一年半內成長30倍3. 圖像內容感知(Content Aware): 為了讓每一位使用者專屬作品留下最好的一剎那，我們App產品，分析每一張使用者創作出來的圖片，提供各種最棒的場景與人像特效工具。我們在找這樣的人才1. 熟悉iOS/Android語言設計2. 具實際App產品上架經驗者佳3. 對 App 的大數據分析、探勘與增加使用者下載/轉換率/留存率有相關經驗者尤佳4. 碩博士，具二年工作經驗者尤佳5. 獲APP競賽得獎經驗者尤佳期待您的加入!

job_lists.title: 資深軟體工程師 (Senior Software Engineer)
job_lists.company: 美商_睿科網路科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description
As a Senior Software Engineer, you will contribute to the advancement of A10 Networks award winning products.  Your responsibilities include designing and enhancing network applications, and providing high quality software implementations.  You will participate in design, code and test plan reviews and interact with cross functional teams.  Part of the job may involve providing assistance to technical support teams on an as needed basis.  Investigation, research and proof of concept projects will also be part of your responsibilities.

Required Qualifications
• Minimum 5 years of experience developing software for network applications
• Strong C/C++ programming skills and hands-on development experience using Linux 
• Experience in multi-threading, multi-core, and real-time high availability embedded systems
• Direct work experience with one of the security technologies: UTM/DCFW, Load Balance, (DPI)Deep Packet Inspection, QoS, WAN optimization, VPN, Firewall, IPS/IDS, or NAT
• Expert at TCP/IP and knowledgeable with common standard protocols such as DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, SSL, ALG, IPsec, AAA(Authentication, Authorization, Accounting), etc.
• Experience programming with one scripting language: shell, perl, python, etc.
• Solid foundation of Layer 2 switching, Layer 3 IP forwarding and routing
• Basic English proficiency in reading, writing, speaking and comprehension
• Bachelor's degrees in computer science, engineering, physics, or math

Preferred Qualifications
• Knowledge of networking security
• Experience programming for high scalability and performance
• Experience with high availability concepts and protocols
• Masters or PhD in computer science, engineering, physics, or math

工作說明
你將擔任資深網路軟體工程師，並加入睿科網路公司的高效能產品開發團隊。
你的責任包括設計、編寫網路應用軟體，以及提高軟體品質。
你會參與跨團隊之 設計，編碼和測試計劃。
如有需要，適時提供睿科技術團隊專業上之援助。
創新技術的調查，研究和實證。

基本須具備以下能力
• 至少五年以上網路相關之軟體開發經驗
• Linux 環境中 C / C++ 程式語言之實作經驗
• 多線程，多核心，即時嵌入式系統, 高容錯系統的經驗
• 至少一種 script 語言的編程經驗，如shell script ，PERL，Python等
• 熟悉網路第2層交換，第3層IP轉發和路由運作
• 深入了解IP網絡和通訊協議， 如TCP/ IP，DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, SSL等
• 具備下列專業技能(至少一項)：UTM/DCFW，系統負載平衡(Load Balance)，深度 IP 封包檢測(DPI)，QoS ，廣域網優化，VPN，防火牆，IPS / IDS，NAT，IPsec或AAA等
• 基本英文能力
• 至少物理，計算機科學，工程或數學的學士學位

具備以下能力尤佳
• 網路安全的知識
• 開發高擴充性和高效能的程式經驗
• 高容錯實作經驗與概念
• 具備物理，計算機科學，工程或數學的碩士或博士學位

About A10 Networks
A10 Networks is a fast growing expansion-stage startup renowned for its technology innovation and leadership in Web Application Delivery appliances. Since the time AX Series was introduced in 2007, we have won three years of The Best of Show at Interop, with many marquee customers worldwide.
Our customers include the top Web Portal providers, top online retailers, top cable operators and many leading enterprises. We have immediate needs to fill 10 job openings in Software Engineering and Quality Assurance (QA) to achieve our hefty goals. All North American positions are based in San Jose, California.
A10 Networks is one of the Top Workplaces in the Bay Area region for two consecutive years, as honored by the San Jose Mercury News. A10 is a promising startup based in Silicon Valley that offers competitive compensation packages and great career opportunities. A10 Networks is an equal opportunity employer M/F/V/D.

關於 美商A10 Networks (美商睿科網路)

A10 Networks (睿科網路) 創立於美國加州矽谷，是一個發展快速、擁有創新技術和引領應用網路科技的公司。 自 2007年推出我們的旗艦 AX系列，連續三年贏得了國際最大Interop展會最佳產品獎，以及許多全球重要客戶的肯定，更受到積極發展雲端科技的臺灣重視與肯定，中華民國經濟部更進一步邀請 A10 Networks至臺灣設立研發中心。
我們以在台北地區建立一個全新的研發中心，並極招募台灣的頂尖人才加入我們的行列。 A10 Networks (睿科網路)不但連續兩年被美國聖荷西水星報譽為矽谷最佳工作場所之一，也是同類產業中成長最快速的公司，在2010年亦獲得全美成長最快之非上市公司 Inc. 500年度排行第46名，這份名單針對目前美國重要經濟來源---美國獨立企業，進行了最詳細及全面性的研究。像Microsoft、American Apparel、Oracle等其他知名企業早期皆藉由進入Inc. 500的排名而受到了關注。同時還榮獲”電腦硬體公司”第二名及”聖荷西當地公司”第二名，A10 Networks創始人兼首席執行長陳澧更成為台灣第一位獲得”最佳亞州經營者公司”第一名的殊榮。

job_lists.title: 軟體工程師 (Software Engineer)
job_lists.company: 美商_睿科網路科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description
As a Software Engineer in networking, you will contribute to the advancement of A10 Networks award winning products.  Your responsibilities include designing and enhancing network applications, and providing high quality software implementations.  You will participate in design, code and test plan reviews and interact with cross functional teams.  Part of the job may involve providing assistance to technical support teams on an as needed basis.  

Required Qualifications
• Minimum 2 years of experience developing software for network applications or protocols
• Strong C programming skills and hands-on development experience using Linux 
• Solid foundation of Layer 2 switching, Layer 3 IP forwarding and routing
• Strong IP networking skills and experience with some protocols such as TCP/IP, HTTP, DNS, DHCP, NTP, SNMP, GRE, etc.
• Experience in multi-threading, multi-core, and real-time high availability embedded systems
• Experience programming with one scripting language: shell, perl, tcl, python, etc.
• Basic English proficiency in reading, writing, speaking and comprehension
• Bachelor's degrees in computer science, engineering, physics, or math

Preferred Qualifications
• Knowledge of IPv6
• Experience with application protocols for Peer to Peer, Instant Messaging or Video Streaming
• Experience with database systems and programming
• Experience programming for high scalability and performance
• Experience with high availability concepts for networking devices
• Direct work experience with one of the technologies: Load balance, deep packet inspection, QoS, WAN optimization, VPN, firewall, IPS/IDS, AV, NAT, or Compression
• Masters or PhD in computer science, engineering, physics, or math

工作說明
你將擔任網路軟體工程師，並加入睿科網路公司的高效能產品開發團隊。
你的責任包括設計、編寫網路應用軟體，以及提高軟體品質。
你會參與跨團隊之 設計，編碼和測試計劃。
如有需要，適時提供睿科技術團隊專業上之援助。

基本須具備以下能力
• 至少兩年以上網路相關之軟體開發經驗
• Linux 環境中 C程式語言之實作經驗
• 熟悉網路第2層交換，第3層IP轉發和路由運作
• 深入了解IP網絡和通訊協議， 如TCP/ IP，HTTP，DNS，DHCP，NTP，SNMP，GRE等
• 多線程，多核心，即時嵌入式系統, 高容錯系統的經驗
• 至少一種 script 語言的編程經驗，如shell script ，PERL，TCL，Python等
• 基本英文能力
• 至少物理，計算機科學，工程或數學的學士學位

具備以下能力尤佳
• IPv6的知識
• P2P 應用協議，即時通訊軟體或視訊應用
• 資料庫系統和開發實作經驗
• 開發高擴充性和高效能的程式經驗
• 高容錯實作經驗與概念
• 具備下列專業技能(至少一項)：系統負載平衡，深度 IP 封包檢測，QoS ，廣域網優化，VPN，防火牆，IPS / IDS，防毒，NAT或 資料壓縮
• 具備物理，計算機科學，工程或數學的碩士或博士學位

job_lists.title: 創意設計中心徵聘Android APP程式設計師
job_lists.company: 中國文化大學_推廣教育部
job_lists.content:
這是份具有挑戰性和創新氣氛的工作，我們是一個12人創新專案小組，整合RFID、Beacon等IOT技術，開發自有硬體及軟體APP，從無到有實做各種創新的智慧教室及數位校園應用，團隊專業分工合作，從發想、規劃、設計到開發，沒有階級上下之分。

如果你喜歡動腦、喜歡嘗試，不想一成不變，享受面對未知的變數，然後一個一個解決掉的成就感，這份工作一定很適合你。

我們這群投身在教育產業的科技人及設計人，總認為除了科技公司的選擇外，用科技解決現今教育問題，用創意翻轉教育產業的責任，更為重大且更有意義，現在不做，以後會後悔。
我們急需熱情的人才加入，一同為下一世代創造更有價值的校園應用及教學模式。

近期相關的報導：
http://news.tvbs.com.tw/life/news-656085/
http://www.ettoday.net/news/20150612/520099.htm

近期實作的企業用APP
http://app.sce.pccu.edu.tw/

近期製作的開發團隊影片
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KT5n9PYQaDU

★★ 敬請應徵者附上作品 ★★

【態度】絕對重要
能站在公司及使用者角度思考
重視品味、設計及生活
正面思考、尊重他人
【特質】很重要
主動發現問題解決問題，不會的會想辦法學會
反應快速，深入傾聽，自信提出見解
總是愛問為什麼不、為什麼要這樣呢?
習慣在混亂的需求與困難中，慢慢的歸納前進，找出最佳化的解決方案

【專長】重要
1年以上Android開發經驗
熟悉物件導向設計原則
有開發適應不同尺寸裝置UI 排版能力
擅長工具 Android Studio

【加分技能】更好
具備View效能提昇、API串接效能提昇等經驗
具備Beacon 整合經驗
行動裝置與Server資料同步經驗
有推播、Facebook、Token串接經驗
Scrum開發經驗
GIT 使用經驗

【工作內容】
創新校園行動服務開發
Beacon應用
物聯網整合應用

2. 熟悉嵌入式開發領域、熟悉C/C++語言
3. 良好的團隊協作精神
4. 有電信市場產品, cable modem, xDSL, GPON, 3G/4G/LTE, DSLAM/OLT 和 switch相關開發經驗更佳。
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.title: iOS工程師
job_lists.company: 風行天股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 風行天是台灣APP產業的領導公司，是一個年輕有活力的團隊，在業界享譽卓著。我們需要一位熱情有天分的iOS工程師加入我們。我們除了承接許多知名業者的軟體開發案外，也積極的在開發、設計自己的平台、產品，所以相信您在這裡可以學到很多程式相關的技巧，有積極向上跟願意挑戰的態度就是我們需要的人才。工作內容：1. iOS軟體開發、測試、上架與維護。2. 依照專案規格、文件與團隊一起開發APP軟體，測試與維護。
job_lists.other_condition: 1. 邏輯清楚，良好的程式設計概念2. 個性認真負責，具備獨立作業能力3. iOS系統SDK應用4. 熟悉iOS、Objective-C並有實務經驗5. 有作品集者優先考慮6. 對APP產業充滿熱情，並願意精進自己的技術7. 不斷改進與追求更好的工作效率

job_lists.title: iOS軟體設計人才培訓計劃
job_lists.company: 風行天股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
您可能對APP開發有興趣，但還沒有機會真正接觸嗎？

您可能曾經為了了解程式而去補習，但一直苦無機會展現身手嗎？

風行天的軟體設計人才培訓計劃，就是您進入這個產業最好的機會！

我們是台灣APP產業的領導公司，是一個年輕有活力的團隊，在業界享譽卓著。 
歡迎對手機APP軟體開發/設計有高度興趣、無APP開發之相關工作經驗、但非常希望學習專業知識之新鮮人或轉職人士，藉由風行天的人才培訓計畫成為專業的APP軟體工程師！

風行天很驕傲地說，自去年8月推動此培訓計劃以來，至今已超過百人應徵，辦過近10場面試說明會！
我們也成功招募了超過10位APP軟體實習生，也順利的將我們自己的實習生們訓練成為專業的APP軟體工程師。
如今的他們都已經可以獨立作業、獨當一面，開發APP已經不再是夢想！

同時，風行天更自豪地說，在APP軟體業，我們是擁有這樣培訓計畫的先鋒！
我們不怕培訓人才，只怕您不敢挑戰～

※請簡單描述過去iOS的學習經驗、當初是利用何種管道學習；無說明者恕不考慮※

說明會時間：106年5月23日
job_lists.other_condition:
1. 學歷不拘，國內外專科以上畢、資工相關科系尤佳。
2. 基本條件：需具備iOS基本知識。
3. 主動積極、願意學習、具良好溝通協調能力及問題分析解決能力。
4. 注重團隊精神，能與跨部門的夥伴協力配合。
5. 對APP產業有滿腔的熱血與憧憬。

job_lists.title: RAN Integration Engineer (Contractor)
job_lists.company: 台灣愛立信股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Summary 
The Integration engineer can be expected to analyze, prepare, implement and verify the configuration and integration of Radio Access Network (RAN). The main job responsibility is to execute LTE network change requests.

Responsibilities & Tasks 
• Plan the implementation of the Product Configuration / Integration work
• Execute network change requests, product configuration and integration
• Prepare acceptance test
• Identify and drive improvements
• Post Project activities perform
job_lists.other_condition:
• Degree holder in Telecommunication / Electronic Engineering / Information Technology or related discipline
• At least 3-year experience in Telecom industry with excellent knowledge in LTE RAN
• Good knowledge in the latest RAN & IP network topology principles & techniques
• Detailed knowledge and ongoing access to knowledge of system design and implemented functional characteristics
Preferred Qualifications & Experience Requirements: 
• Willing to work under high pressure and taking initiative with good focus on problem solving
• Strong team-work across different functional teams locally, regionally and globally
• Pro-active and customer-oriented with good customer communication skills


約聘員工福利
1. 勞保、健保、團保、及定期健康檢查
2. 每人配備工作筆記型電腦及手機通話費補助
3. 優良的工作環境:員工休息區免費咖啡茶水供應、符合人體工學可調整高度的辦公桌椅
4. 人性化管理、重視內部溝通及團隊精神、與不同文化國籍同事工作
5. 完善的職能發展環境、專業或管理技能訓練、具體的工作職涯規劃

job_lists.title: 軟體工程師-日系知名製造商【日商※新竹工作＊英文必須・福利制度超優】(11555)
job_lists.company: 立樂高園股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
★日系超知名資訊相關機器、精密儀器製造商，軟體工程師招募中！★
工作地點在新竹，本次招募自動化設備系統的工程師。
全世界的員工數達到70000人以上！
是一間人人都皆可在職場上擁有活躍表現的企業。

★主要的工作內容★
-ICH客製化軟體開發
-撰寫軟體設計書
-撰寫軟體測試報告書

★職缺魅力★
有著僅有大企業的豐厚福利制度。
不僅能累積工程師的工作經驗，更能提升語言能力和學習到日本特有的技術。

★企業概要★
總公司位於長野縣的資訊相關機器與精密機器的製造商。
最初製造噴墨印表機起家，隨後開始製造其他印表機、數位投影機、電腦等資訊處理機器，石英震盪器、半導體等電子裝置零件為主。

★福利制度★
・忘年晚會
・尾牙抽獎
・結婚禮金
・健康檢查
・慰問金
・中秋禮品
・國內外旅遊自助行補助
・生日禮金
・彌月禮金
・男性陪產假
・商品購買折扣
・退休金提撥
・離職金相對提撥
・免費團體保險, 保障高 : 壽險50萬 / 意外傷害醫療 / 住院醫療險 / 意外險(36倍月薪 + 250萬 + 因公意外36倍月薪) / 癌症醫療險
job_lists.other_condition:
必須條件：
・科系要求：電機電子工程相關
・語文條件：英文/初級商業程度
・擅長工具：C、C#、C++、MFC、Visual C++、VBScript、Excel、PowerPoint、Word

歡迎條件：
- 自動化設備開發經驗2年以上
- VC&MFC、VB軟體實務開發經驗 2年以上，熟悉軟體開發流程及軟體Debug技巧
- 具備中等英文聽說讀寫能力
- 具備日文聽說讀寫能力尤佳
- 具備邏輯思考，個人時間管理確實

job_lists.title: 【日本工作】韌體設計/軟體設計 組裝工程師＊skype面試 J4
job_lists.company: 立樂高園股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
韌體設計/軟體設計  工程師赴日工作！ 日幣20~40万円/月
工作簽證費用無料/提供初期租屋費用/前往日本機票
另外還有提供宿舍（二万円/月）外加免費日文進修


■面接場所 ：台湾/台北
■面接時間 ：7/15（六）
【職務內容】
自動車・医療機器・工作機械等の開発全般／機構・筐体・金型設計、CAE解析等
【具体例としては】
◆家電・自動車・輸送機械の概念設計業務
■求める要件: 
【必須要件】
家電・自動車・輸送機械等の組込・制御の経験のある方　
★分野、年数不問です。
【尚可要件】
■C、C++、アセンブラなどでの組込制御開発の経験 
■家電等のマイコン制御経験 
■Webサイト構築、NWシステム構築、DB設計経験 
■評価・検証の経験
【見極め方】
■C言語の経験あり
■家電・自動車・機械などのWEBではなく、目に見えるものの組み込み制御経験
【尚可要件】 
◆経験の浅い方も気軽にご相談を！ 
◆第二新卒(大学/理工系既卒)も歓迎！
■語学レベル
・N2相当以上。
（日本語でコミュニケーションが取れる方）
■年収
¥4,000,000～7,000,000
（ご経験に応じて要相談）
■月給制：22万円～40万円/月
※スキル・経験に応じて優遇
■給与改定：年1回
■賞与：年2回
【年収例】
400万円／経験5年、エンジニア、28歳／月給26万円
620万円／経験15年、プロジェクトマネージャ、38歳／月給41万円
800万円／経験20年、チーフエンジニア、42歳／月給53万円
■待遇/ 福利厚生など:
◆雇用形態：正社員
◆諸手当：交通費全額支給　　　
◆休日・休暇：
週休2日制(土日祝※祝日のある週は土曜日出勤）年末年始、夏季、有給、慶弔、特別
年間休日123日(特別休暇含む)
◆各種保険：健康保険、雇用保険、労災保険、厚生年金
◆待遇福利厚生：
財形貯蓄制度
転勤赴任一時金
帰省旅費補助
寮・社宅制度(家族・単身・独身)※月2万円～3万円+光熱費を個人負担
引越費用補助
従業員持株会（奨励金あり）
労働組合
健康保険組合
定年再雇用
通信教育補助
社内外講習補助
勉強会講師料補助
図書購入補助
資格取得補助
社外技術研修参加費
教育自己啓発関連
学会参加費
自己啓発支援
■勤務地:
日本全国のメーカー様へ出向。（ご希望の地域を優遇します。）
◆この仕事で得られるもの：:
「従業員一人ひとりが成長してこそ、より高い水準のサービスが提供できる」その考えに基づき、
それぞれのスキルアップや働きやすさを目指した多彩なサポート環境を整えています。
【特徴的な取り組み】
◆「弊社のこれまで取り組んだ技術」＋「今後、国として成長する技術」
上記を客観的･体系的に把握した弊社独自の「技術戦略マップ」を策定。
エンジニアの方向性を明確化し、更なるスキルアップ、キャリアアップを可能に。
◆一人一人の社員のキャリアアップをサポートする、ＣＤＡ（キャリア・デザイン・アドバイザー）制度。
元エンジニアがエンジニアのバリューアップに繋がる教育や研修を用意。
◆業務上必要な技術スキルだけでなく、ヒューマンやビジネススキルを高めることを目的としたとても充実した内容の教育研修制度。
◆エンジニアのありたい姿・ありたい働き方の達成（自己実現）のために全社をあげてサポートする、
自己実現委員会の設置。
◆生涯エンジニアとして生きるも良し。これまでの経験を活かし、他職種へ挑戦するも良し。
一人一人の社員の人生を考え、様々な職種へのキャリアパスも可能。
job_lists.other_condition:
＊需具備基本日文能力(N3)以上
＊需具備理工相關科系畢業或相關經驗者佳
＊想赴日本工作冒險家精神者佳
＊日本打工度假畢業者佳
＊日本留學畢業生佳

job_lists.title: Android APP developer
job_lists.company: 竹間智能科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
[Job Duty]
1. Design and build advanced and intertesting applications for the Android platform which is related to A.I. product.
2. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
3. Improve application performance and maintain the applications.

[Must have]
3+ years of experiences working on Android with strong Java programming/debugging skills 
Ability to develop the App independently, and also have team work experience

Solid experience on Android SDK & App architecture (ex: Service, ContentProvider, Thread ... etc.)
Advanced Android UI skills (ex: Customize widgets, RecyclerView, Fragments ... etc.) 
Well knowledge of web service and experience on mobile/cloud API integration 
Experience on integrating Android open source libraries
Ability to analysis OOM/ANR issues and conduct new mobile technology study

[Nice to have]
Apps on the app store. (Please share the link in advance)
Server development experience is a plus 
DesignPattern/Git/Gradle System/Proguard configuration
job_lists.other_condition:
1. Proven software development experience
2. Experience with Android SDK
3. Actual App. develop experience

■面接場所 ：台湾/台北
■面接時間 ：7/15（六）
【職務內容】
自動車・医療機器・工作機械等の開発全般／機構・筐体・金型設計、CAE解析等
【具体例としては】
◆家電・自動車・輸送機械の概念設計業務
■求める要件: 
【必須要件】
家電・自動車・輸送機械等の組込・制御の経験のある方　
★分野、年数不問です。
【尚可要件】
■C、C++、アセンブラなどでの組込制御開発の経験 
■家電等のマイコン制御経験 
■Webサイト構築、NWシステム構築、DB設計経験 
■評価・検証の経験
【見極め方】
■C言語の経験あり
■家電・自動車・機械などのWEBではなく、目に見えるものの組み込み制御経験
【尚可要件】 
◆経験の浅い方も気軽にご相談を！ 
◆第二新卒(大学/理工系既卒)も歓迎！
■語学レベル
・N2相当以上。
（日本語でコミュニケーションが取れる方）
■年収
¥4,000,000～7,000,000
（ご経験に応じて要相談）
■月給制：22万円～40万円/月
※スキル・経験に応じて優遇
■給与改定：年1回
■賞与：年2回
【年収例】
400万円／経験5年、エンジニア、28歳／月給26万円
620万円／経験15年、プロジェクトマネージャ、38歳／月給41万円
800万円／経験20年、チーフエンジニア、42歳／月給53万円
■待遇/ 福利厚生など:
◆雇用形態：正社員
◆諸手当：交通費全額支給　　　
◆休日・休暇：
週休2日制(土日祝※祝日のある週は土曜日出勤）年末年始、夏季、有給、慶弔、特別
年間休日123日(特別休暇含む)
◆各種保険：健康保険、雇用保険、労災保険、厚生年金
◆待遇福利厚生：
財形貯蓄制度
転勤赴任一時金
帰省旅費補助
寮・社宅制度(家族・単身・独身)※月2万円～3万円+光熱費を個人負担
引越費用補助
従業員持株会（奨励金あり）
労働組合
健康保険組合
定年再雇用
通信教育補助
社内外講習補助
勉強会講師料補助
図書購入補助
資格取得補助
社外技術研修参加費
教育自己啓発関連
学会参加費
自己啓発支援
■勤務地:
日本全国のメーカー様へ出向。（ご希望の地域を優遇します。）
◆この仕事で得られるもの：:
「従業員一人ひとりが成長してこそ、より高い水準のサービスが提供できる」その考えに基づき、
それぞれのスキルアップや働きやすさを目指した多彩なサポート環境を整えています。
【特徴的な取り組み】
◆「弊社のこれまで取り組んだ技術」＋「今後、国として成長する技術」
上記を客観的･体系的に把握した弊社独自の「技術戦略マップ」を策定。
エンジニアの方向性を明確化し、更なるスキルアップ、キャリアアップを可能に。
◆一人一人の社員のキャリアアップをサポートする、ＣＤＡ（キャリア・デザイン・アドバイザー）制度。
元エンジニアがエンジニアのバリューアップに繋がる教育や研修を用意。
◆業務上必要な技術スキルだけでなく、ヒューマンやビジネススキルを高めることを目的としたとても充実した内容の教育研修制度。
◆エンジニアのありたい姿・ありたい働き方の達成（自己実現）のために全社をあげてサポートする、
自己実現委員会の設置。
◆生涯エンジニアとして生きるも良し。これまでの経験を活かし、他職種へ挑戦するも良し。
一人一人の社員の人生を考え、様々な職種へのキャリアパスも可能。

job_lists.title: [RD] React Native App開發工程師
job_lists.company: 天堂遊戲有限公司
job_lists.content:
Hey there, thanks for your interest in Paradise-Soft.

PS's Mobile Engineering team is searching for a React Native developer that can make our mobile apps best in class. We leverage React Native to build beautiful, performant and intuitive Android and iOS apps. You’ll help us ensure that the mobile apps are better than a native equivalent by pushing the bounds of JavaScript and to look for high-value opportunities to introduce React Native to our PS apps. If you like working on a fast-paced team developing customer-facing features that are used at an incredible scale, then our team might be a perfect fit. Come hit the ground running as we architect the next generation of our platform.
 
Responsibilities:
● You'll own the experience end-to-end, all the way down to the native code that runs within the Paradise-Soft Gaming App.
● Be a major individual contributor of coding on the team who is comfortable working independently.
● Design and develop software features based on visual mockups or user stories.
● Monitor the mobile ecosystem for native platform changes and innovative apps that can be leveraged internally for performance or user experience improvements.
● Ensure reliability by always taking into consideration performance and different network connection scenarios.
● Prototype user experience concepts prior to new feature implementation.
 
Desired Skills & Experience:
● Computer science fundamentals in object-oriented design.
● Computer science fundamentals in data structures.
● Good knowledge of JavaScript/React Native/Redux(Flux) development preferably with demonstrable projects.
● Contributed to several apps in the App or Play Store.
● Up to date with the latest iOS and Android best practices.
job_lists.other_condition:
The ideal candidate would have experience doing mobile application development in either Objective C, Swift, or React. If the candidate has no experience in this area, the ideal candidate would be interested in mobile, and able to ramp up in this area.
Candidates will have excellent problem-solving skills, a solid understanding of computer science fundamentals, and a quantitative mindset. We are seeking engineers who are highly pragmatic and can solve real-world problems quickly and efficiently. We want engineers who thrive in and contribute to a team atmosphere.

● Expert knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery.

● Experience translating design mockups and prototypes into working application designs.

● Experience web frameworks  and libraries such as Backbone, Angular, GWT and React.js

job_lists.title: System Reliability Specialist
job_lists.company: 禦騰科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
JOB PURPOSE
System Reliability Engineers are hybrid systems and software engineers who are responsible and take ownership for reliability, automation, and other issues related to keeping the service uptime in Nexusguard foundation. SREs are integrated within the DevOPs team who will be a part of developing infrastructure software, maintaining it, and scaling it.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITY AREA
● Contribute to design, write and deliver software to improve the reliability, scalability, latency, and efficiency of your services.   
● Solve problems relating to mission critical services and create solutions to prevent problem recurrence; with the goal of automating response to all non-exceptional service conditions.   
● Influence and contribute to new designs, architectures, standards and methods for large-scale distributed systems.   
● Engage in service capacity planning and demand forecasting, software performance analysis and system tuning. 
● Participates in the final roll out of new releases. This includes performance and site acceptance testing that will assure adherence to functional specifications.
● Monitoring high level product problem concerns and seeking commitment from appropriate departments so that necessary actions can be taken
● Serving as an expert in the application of product problem and/or reliability analysis techniques.
● Perform root cause analysis for production issues where the root cause is in infrastructure, environment, configuration, or deployment routines; understand when to escalate to product development teams; remediate root causes and implement preventative actions.
● Participate in after-hours maintenance when necessary, respond to emergencies, participate in customer calls when called upon in support of initiatives and incident response
● Creating complex and/or new reports and metrics
● Participate in 24*7 rotation duties
job_lists.other_condition:
Education and Professional Certificate Level:
● BS Degree in Computer Science, Electrical & Computer Engineering or Mathematics or equivalent experience 

Length and Type of Job-Relevant Experience:  
● 5+ years of experience and outstanding coding skills in C, C++, C#, Java, Python or similar languages   
● 1+ years of experience in testing, deploying and supporting services   
● Experience in SDLC and Agile projects   
● A passion for building and participating in highly effective teams and development processes   
● Expertise in problem solving and analyzing distributed systems and critical production service environments   
● Debugging, testing / validation and analytics/SQL skills.   
● Big data experience preferred (COSMOS, Hadoop)   
● Fundamental understanding of OSI model/stack   
● Strong communication and collaboration skills to work with people from a variety of technical backgrounds

job_lists.title: 數據工程師 Data engineer
job_lists.company: Shopline Limited_商線科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Shopline, a fully funded, 500 Startups Accelerator company, is looking for a passionate and talented Software Engineer​ to join our team in Taiwan. You’ll be a part of an engineering team that is dedicated to developing a reliable and robust commerce platform for merchants in Asia.

At SHOPLINE we are working on very intenteresting initiatives that would involve using data-mining and machine learning. with the vast amount of data that we currently have and growing exponentially. We will share details during the interview.  

【What you’ll be doing】
1. Develop, operate, and monitor ETL for data collection, cleansing, processing, storage, and analytics
2. Develop data visualization to track data usage, server status, and represent data insights
3. Automate data process tasks and support data analysis tasks
4. Use existing algorithms and implement data-mining strategies to achieve our end goal.

【What Are we looking for?】
1. At least 2 years of experience in building and operating large scale distributed systems or applications
2. At least 2 years of experience in processing data with Python (scikit-learn), Scala, or R
3. Familiar with Hadoop ecosystem, such as Spark, Hive, Hue, Pig
4. Experience with implementing highly scalable systems on top of cloud infrastructures, such as AWS or GCP
5. Expertise in Linux/Unix environments and familiar with shell scripting
6. Expertise in hands-on ETL job design, components and modules development of data process
7. Great communication skill and can-do attitude
8. Desired skills: Python (scikit-learn), Scala, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Linux/Unix, AWS, MySQL/Mongo/PostgreSQL, R
job_lists.other_condition: Data mining and machine learning algorithm experience is a big plus

and constant growth.

architectures, and distributed systems.
- UNIX/Linux systems knowledge and/or systems administration background.

我們是一間正在成長的軟體公司，致力研發拓展事業版圖的各種科技產品，幫助各個企業節省成本、降低流動率，以及培育人才，進而精準管理以達到最佳效率。我們擁有極佳團隊默契，產品皆為公司優秀的研發團隊歷經多時所創之結晶。我們團隊經驗豐富，成長快速，曾任職於 Amazon，IBM，MicroStrategy，PayPal等大型科技公司，公司資源豐足，也希望網羅各地好手與我們共同深耕蓬勃。

我們正在找一名軟體開發經理，負責在我們的產品平台上建立領先業界的的企業員工關係管理應用與服務。我們發展迅速並有愉快的工作環境。您的工作重點將是為製造和飯店業的客戶創造出驚豔的軟體解決方案，並對他們的生活產生正向影響。

公司簡介:
公司為全球知名美商IC Design House.
位於新竹公道五路上.
目前專案為iOT物聯網, 主要針對智慧城市與智慧家居市場, 範疇遍布亞洲: 台灣/日本/韓國/香港...等等.
去年年底併購了一家大型美商車用電子公司, 在車聯網的部分也在建構的範疇中.
如果你對全球領先技術有強大的好奇心與熱忱, 這裡是你最好選擇!

工作環境與福利:
位於信義區中心, 近市政府捷運站.
薪資以年薪的方式核薪, 12個月發放, 所以比起台灣大廠20月的發薪方式, 
在這裡你的月薪會直接提高近兩倍的數字. 付出一個月的努力與貢獻, 就能得到一個月的報酬, 不用等到年底才能領獎金.

聘僱方式:
約聘制, 會先簽到九月或者一年一簽, 最多兩年的時間.
因為是長期需求, 所以如果表現良好, 續約及轉正職的機率很高.
因為此公司正職的機會非常難申請且名額有限, 萬中選一; 所以此機會的好處是, 搶先加入, 能比其他人更有機會轉為正式員工!

招募以下職位, 若您在校論文和此領域相關, 對以下職缺感興趣, 都歡迎投遞履歷.
我們會再直接跟您介紹更詳細的內容!
1. Software Engineer
● support IOT products for customer projects, also co-work with internal cross-geo engineering team to investigate and solve customer issues. 
● support new business engagements and do on-site customer/lab visit to resolve customer issues. 

Requirement:
● Familiar with WiFi 802.11a/b/g/n/ac protocol and infrastructure is preferred.
● Familiar with Embedded Linux/Linux Android/OpenWRT is a plus. 

2. System Engineer
● Chip bring up, system parameter (registers) optimization, performance (throughput) tuning.

Requirement:
● Experienced in communications (WiFi or BT) system 
● Familiar with PCI, PCIE, USB, or SDIO interface, with capability to debug platform compatibility issue (Nice to have) 
● Antenna design 
● Support FPGA verification
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.title: ML-【信義】全球第一外商IC Design house徵 Camera /Power/ Audio Engineer!! 年薪$80-160萬
job_lists.company: 新加坡商立可人事顧問有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
美國IC大廠大力徵才
電機/電子/資工資管背景 新鮮人可 英文精通 

【Camera Support Engineer】
● Support image/video tuning and verification for IOT projects 
● Work with image tuning team to improve camera/video quality, verify and compare the quality of IOT projects (IP cameras/Drones/Sports Cameras/360 cameras..). 
● BS/MS degree in EE/CS  
● Understanding of image processing for camera and IOT products. 
● Good C/C++ and Matlab coding is a plus.


【Power Management Software Engineer】
● Work with world leading Internet of Everything i.e any forms of IoT devices such as smart cameras, wearables, smart assistants, robots, auto infotainments or drones device makers from design &develop to commercially launch exciting new products. 
● These Core BSP & Multimedia Customer Engineers are expected to: 
-Understand every aspects of customers' IoT requirements and designs 
- To communicate with internal product & development teams on any HW/SW design related issues/features from customer designs 
- To work with customers development teams in resolving any IoT feature development and product commercialization issues 
● BS/MS degree in EE/CS 
● Work experience on ARM processor and good understanding of low power modes of the system. 
● Good understanding and implementation experience of C/C++ , RTOS, LINUX and hands on experience on android devices 
● Good hands on experience in using the debug tools like JTAG and log parsers and also oscilloscope usage experience for capturing the signals to debug 
● Debugging knowledge PMIC or charging modules knowledge.


【Audio Software Engineer】
● Work with world leading Internet of Everything i.e any forms of IoT devices such as smart cameras, wearables, smart assistants, robots, auto infotainments or drones device makers from design &develop to commercially launch exciting new products. 
● These Core BSP & Multimedia Customer Engineers are expected to: 
-Understand every aspects of customers' IoT requirements and designs 
- To communicate with internal product & development teams on any HW/SW design related issues/features from customer designs 
- To work with customers development teams in resolving any IoT feature development and product commercialization issues 
● BS/MS degree in EE/CS 
● Prior courses/studies or Thesis/Papers in the field of DSP/Speech Processing are highly desired 
● Understanding of C/C++ in DSP algorithm programming 
● Digital signal processing expertise (digital filtering, echo cancellation, speech recognition)

job_lists.title: ML-【汐止】知名電商平台 Jr.~Sr. JAVA工程師, 月薪$30-70K*13個月!
job_lists.company: 新加坡商立可人事顧問有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
1、擅長設定目標和具有程式設計經驗，有 HTML,SCRIPT,CSS, Javascript(JQuery) 開發經驗。 
2、可執行並熟悉網路服務和具有網路發展技能，必須具有良好的排除故障和檢修的能力，有Ajax,JQUERY,HTML/XML開發經驗者佳。 
3、熟悉JAVA/WEB架構及ORM技術：SSH(Struts2,Spring和Hibernate)、SpringMVC、iBatis、JPA優先錄取。 
4、熟悉Eclipse, Netbeans等開發工具。

其他條件：
1、JAVA/J2EE 2年以上開發經驗 
2、網路技術：HTML4 (會使用HTML5優先)，JAVASCRIPT(JAVASCRIPT FRAMEWORK:例:JQUERY),CSS JAVA/WEB FRAMEWORKS: STRUTS2, SPRINGMVC 
3、Open Source Framework ORM: HIBERNATE,IBAYIS 
4、具有良好的電腦與商務應用軟體使用技能。具有分析並解決設計，研發和軟體測試問題的能力。 
5、可與團隊進行良好的配合，擅長與團隊溝通協調。 
6、良好的溝通能力使得團隊成員，後勤和客戶間能能進行有效的溝通。

job_lists.other_condition:
為什麼優秀的你應該認真考慮我們的程式設計師職務：

一、軟體設計是我們公司的核心業務
不像大部分公司，軟體可能是附屬部門(大部分的公司都是業務第一，其他都是附屬品。)因此我們仔細設計軟體與網站產品，創作出有用、好用的軟體設計是我們公司的核心競爭力，軟體工程師佔公司6成以上人數，優異的程式設計師，在我們公司有最重要且核心的位置。

二、有優秀同事共同創造與成長
我們知道能跟優秀的程式設計師共事，那真是一件爽快的的事，因為優秀的同事會刺激你非得迎頭趕上的上進心，尤其是一起討論問題的解決方案時，他們會觸發你有更好的解決思維力能力，彼此共同成長並且一起享受解謎與破關般的樂趣(你一定聽得懂我在說甚麼感覺)。

三、我們專選有挑戰難題來解決
我們相信未來是軟體主宰世界的時代，不斷在這領域找出值得挑戰的難題，解決並產生效益才是公司長久的競爭力，所有如果你喜歡面對挑戰，欣賞我們找未知領域單挑的態度，那這就是屬於你的地方。

四、良好的開發環境與工具
超快的i5以上 CPU 配超大雙螢幕，16G以上記憶體及SSD硬碟是我們程式設計師的基本配備，讓你享受高速開發程式的快感（誰會反對這一點呢？）。就像樵夫砍木頭，與其不眠不休的努力工作，我們先幫你把斧頭磨利。

五、參與產品的規劃
程式設計師最大的成就感，就是開發出真的能改善他人生活的成品，而這樣的產品問世，除了規劃人員外，程式開發人員的參與是很重要的部分，我們希望從開始就聆聽你的看法、意見，一起來幫助產品成功。

六優渥的薪資
優秀的程式設計師和一般水準的程式設計師之間的差異是極大的，我們一直在尋找(當然我們也一直在培訓)這樣的人才，如果你是這樣的人，絕對值得優渥的薪資。

七、單純不官僚
我們盡全力打造能讓所有人在對的職務上，做對的事情，用真心與人一對一深度溝通，絕沒有無聊冗長的會議，培養並看中您的實力而不看關係。曾被大組織官僚文化折磨過的人，相信在這裡可以讓你耳目一新，讓你的天賦與努力徹底發揮。

八、不用加班
我們認為公司如果需要常態加班，這樣的公司競爭一定大有問題，所以請你放心準時下班回去休息、充電，希望你能每早帶著快樂的心情，迎向每個全新一天的可能性。

如果你是優秀的程式設計師，正在尋找讓您的理想與能力徹底發揮的地方，請立刻把您的履歷寄給我們吧！

job_lists.title: 程式設計師(實習)
job_lists.company: 全曜財經資訊股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
【關於此職務】
為什麼有志於程式開發的你，應該認真考慮我們的 『實習程式設計師』職務呢？

如果你對程式開發很有興趣，但是卻沒有相關經驗（譬如資工、資管大三、四或剛畢業），甚至不是資訊相關科系畢業，卻自認邏輯清楚，嚮往 以程式開發為終身志業，歡迎您來應徵這個實習 程式設計師的職務。只要你有決心，我們會以 三個月的時間，訓練你，讓你有機會成為用雙手創造改變的 優秀程式設計師。

1.理工科系畢業，無程式開發經驗可（在校生亦可 有實習時數最低限制）。
2.對撰寫程式開發有高度興趣，有志以此為終身職業。
3.樂於學習並希望創造優異的程式 影響這個世界。
4.對思辨、挑戰、創造改變 非常感興趣
5.喜愛並能願意學習、掌握各種新技術的重點
6.邏輯能力強，喜歡發現問題並挑戰最佳解決方案
7.自律、自信、積極主動、樂觀、喜歡做有效益的事情
8.有彈性、樂於接受領導、能溝通、樂於助人、習慣團隊合作
9.資訊相關科系 大三大四生或剛畢業者尤佳
10.實習時數，ㄧ周必須能來滿24小時以上(目前暫不收僅能暑期來的實習生)
job_lists.other_condition:

job_lists.title: Web Site/App Designer (Ruby, Angular JS, PHP)
job_lists.company: 愛利奧有限公司
job_lists.content:
Aillio is looking to add a new member to our team. We are a small but very international company with an office near Taipei Main Station. Our primary business is manufacturing really cool coffee roaster machines for sale all over the world. They are called “Bullets” but they kind of look like little pigs. 

To be perfectly honest, the product is quite nice. It’s a lovely design, forward-thinking, and already creating significant buzz within a fast-growing industry.
 
Here are a few good reasons you may want to work here:
 
Flexible schedule. If it works for you, and it works for us, then we can make it work together.

International environment. We are Danish, American, and Taiwanese. And our customers come from every corner of the earth.

Dynamic industry. I know this is a marketing buzz term, but we’re serious about this. Knowledge and appreciation of specialty coffee continues to grow at an astounding pace all over the world. This should not surprise you, though, because coffee is awesome, right?

Opportunities to learn. We are only a company of 5 people, which means you will have an insider’s view of nearly every aspect of our business. 

Travel. This is a worldwide business, and that means the need to travel is ever present – to every continent other than Antarctica, where they only drink instant coffee, unfortunately.
 
And here is a bit more info about the skillsets we are looking for:

1. Ruby on Rails
2. Angular JS
3. PHP


We are looking to grow quite a bit this year. It's time for our main website to to be updated, which means we need someone with solid wordpress/php skills. We also have a much bigger project in mind, designing a social media platform from sratch, which is based on Ruby on Rails. AND we have our own proprietary roasting software, which we are hoping to both level-up and make compatible with all the major OS, especially Mac. Hence teh need for some web-app development skills

Love of excellent coffee would also be a big plus. You *will* learn how to pull a shot of espresso.
We drink a lot of it here. 

So if you feel like you can help us with any of these things, please let us know!

4. Cordova, Visual Stodio 跨平台開發經驗佳
job_lists.other_condition:
1. 軟體工程師或APP 開發兩年以上經驗, 具相関開發經驗尤佳
2. 具溝通協調與問題處理能力
3. 需能配合至客戶端進行技術支援

job_lists.title: Android 工程師
job_lists.company: 年頡科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
### 你將會負責
1. 開發很酷、使用者體驗很好、全世界數十億人使用的Android App。
2. 和我們超強的PM還有Designer一起討論並且打造出的很棒App。

### 我們希望你擁有的特質
1. 喜歡下載並且試用各式各樣的App。
2. 每當Android有發布新的東西都興奮不已。
3. 除了對程式開發感到濃厚興趣之外，還能有自己另外的興趣喜好。
4. 懂得時間分配、清楚自己要的是什麼。
5. 積極學習新知和技能的熱情。
6. 正確傳達資訊的溝通能力。

### 我們希望你擁有的專業技能
1. Android開發經驗超過一年，並且有在不同螢幕尺寸和解析度、不同品牌手機開發的經驗。
2. 熟悉Android SDK、Design Guideline、Java、OO的概念。
3. 知道如何使用第三方Library（不論是使用Gradle或是pull下來）。
4. 知道如何串接後端RESTful API或第三方API（例如：Facebook, Google...等）。
4. 會用Git做版本控管和共同協作，知道git reset --soft和--hard的差異。
5. 對 UI/UX 設計敏感度佳，注重細節和使用流程，能從使用者角度思考。

### 你會這些更好
1. 從構想 -> UI設計 -> Coding -> 測試 -> 上架能一手包辦。
1. 在台上做過技術分享，能將自己會的技術與晚輩分享。
2. 喜歡參與技術社群，對技術保持熱情和開放的好奇心。
3. 有自己的Github專案，曾經contribute其他專案那會更棒。
4. 擁有自己的作品集或上架經驗。
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.title: Android軟體工程師(創宇行動-電子商務產業)
job_lists.company: 創業家兄弟股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
本公司日前推出了全新B2B2C購物平台『松果購物』，需要從無到有建立一個新的電子商務新平台，並嘗試各種電子商務模式的可能性。目前這個新團隊，需要召募一批有創業精神且能獨立作業的工作夥伴，一起來挑戰這個新的任務。

職位要求與工作內容:
由於這是一個創業團隊，因此整個團隊和所有工作都會非常重視「彈性」和「速度」。創業團隊早期通常沒有非常明確的分工，每個成員要各自在這個團隊中找到自己的舞台，一起合力把產品帶到對的方向。

這個職缺主要的工作內容是從無到有開發出App，工作內容包括與PM討論並一起設計出好的UI，與後端工程師一起開發出這個App所有的功能。


您需要的能力:
-至少1~2年相關工作經驗
-曾經無到有獨立開發app的經驗
-對UI/UX有敏感度
-好的溝通能力(新創團隊的每天工作都需要和其他成員非常密切的溝通)
-熱愛自己開發出來的產品，有動力把事情做到最好。

job_lists.title: Web Front End Developer 網站前端工程師
job_lists.company: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Gogoro is helping to create a more intelligent and adaptive system for today’s most dynamic cities through electric energy, working toward a better future by putting power in the hands of consumers around the world.

As Gogoro Front End Engineer, you will be responsible for planning and maintaining Gogoro own digital channels, including corporate site, online store, user portal and blog.  You will manage internal and external design and programming resources to ensure the websites are updated timely and performed above the market standards.  You will be part of Gogoro digital marketing team, reporting to marketing technologists / CRM manager and work closely with marketers to support sales / marketing activities.

● Build, maintain and update website content in accordance with Gogoro GTM plan.
● Manage websites and perform continual maintenance; this can includes content, links, database, order flows, registration and login flows.
● Conduct advanced web programming with the knowledge of HTML and CSS.
● Liaison with internal / external design agencies to manage their resources and deliverables.
● Maintain strong relationship with MIS team to monitor the website traffic, loading time and other performance metrics.
● Work with SEM / SEO manager and other marketers to set parameters within site’s architecture to ensure the ads are properly tracked. 
● Stay up to date on the web’s latest technologies and make sure the site and its products are always mobile-friendly and multi-platform ready.
job_lists.other_condition:
*All applicants require to offer English profile
● 3+ years front-end programming experience.
● With strong knowledge in HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3 and advanced knowledge in JS, JQuery, and other development language.
● Superb attention to detail, personal organization and project management abilities.
● Superior written and verbal communication skills.
● Business English fluency
● Preferred qualification: Software development and startup background experience a plus.

job_lists.title: LPWAN Protocol Development Engineer
job_lists.company: 優必闊科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
本公司刻正進行創新的長距離低耗電（LPWAN）通訊方案Weightless P 之開發 （詳見 www.ubiik.com）, 預期將透過技術及商業模式的創新，全球夥伴生態體系的建構等策略，對全球LPWAN產業帶來重大影響，帶動新一波的產業發展。為滿足國際市場對本公司技術及產品之需求，誠徵資深通訊協定工程師1~2名，歡迎具備以下專長及經驗的朋友加入，共同開發此一全球領先的創新通訊方案：

- Experience implementing 2G, 3G, LTE or similar Protocol Stack (L1, RLC/MAC, PDCP, RRC, MM) on MS/UE and/or BS/(e)NodeB.
- Exposure to link-level simulation or network simulation is a plus.
- Advanced C/C++ skills on realtime OS (FreeRTOS, Nucleus, Linux, etc) on embedded platforms (Cortex-M & A).
- Good testing and debugging methodology and skills. Knowledge of at least one mainstream scripting language (Python, Perl, etc) is a plus.
- Highly motivated, solution-oriented proactive team player and able to work independently.
- Good communication skills, ability to explain difficult technical concepts clearly.

job_lists.content: 主要工作：+ iPhone / iPad 等 iOS 程式設計研發。+開發手機電子商務應用軟體(Native App)。+手機應用工程團隊有將近20人，你不會單打獨鬥，我們注重團隊合作、知識累積、分享與成長。+ 公司發展的技術涵蓋 iPhone/Android/.Net/Script Languages 等開發技術，內部每週技術交流會議，各領域高手能相互過招、分享，彼此技術功力相互加乘，突飛猛進。我們也非常歡迎跨平台開發能力的養成。+ 重視技術人才的培養與長期發展，讓每個工程師可以一直學習、成長、精進，並因身為工程師而感到驕傲。

job_lists.title: Android 軟體開發工程師
job_lists.company: 91APP_九易宇軒股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 您對瞬息萬變、技術持續不斷演進的APP軟體開發有興趣嗎？您對蓬勃發展的電子商務充滿憧憬嗎？如果您想開發百萬下載等級的APP，歡迎加入我們的團隊。本職缺徵求Android 開發工程師，與專業的開發團隊（Product Manager, UX/UI, Android/iOS工程師，伺服器端工程師，以及DevOps 團隊）合作，共同打造全台灣最多人使用的行動電子商務軟體。本公司採用敏捷式開發方法，錄取者需參加每日站立會議，Planning Session, Retrospective, 並與團隊合作，負責規劃、設計、與開發各項行動電子商務所需行動應用程式。除了應用程式外，錄取者也需要了解並有機會參與開發完整的APP服務架構，包含但不限於Build System, Continuous Integration Server, Push Server 等。錄取者也須持續研究並掌握各項Android 相關技術，以及重要平台如Facebook等的發展。我們鼓勵創新與精進，新平台、新架構、新工具的採用，以及任何改善流程的作法都歡迎提出討論。我們歡迎對各項新技術有興趣並積極學習的夥伴加入我們團隊，共享技術及公司成長的喜悅。
job_lists.other_condition: 擅長：Android Studio／Gradle／Jenkins／Bitbucket有開發與技術討論的熱情，並能與夥伴腦力激盪，團隊合作產品開發勇於接觸新領域與新技術的學習與實現

job_lists.title: Web軟體工程師 (Fullstack, Front-End, Server-End Engineer)
job_lists.company: 現觀科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
參與一充滿活力的 Java Web 界面開發小組，持續設計、研發已由全球許多先進電信業者採用的大數據系統的前端界面。

相關工作包含前端及後端的開發，使用Java, Java Script, React JS, GWT,..等開發語言與架構，根據同仁的能力可分工專注於前端開發或後端開發，若對整體流程皆有興趣者也可參與一條鞭的角色。
job_lists.skills: 軟體程式設計、網路程式設計
job_lists.other_condition:
1. 最少一年的 Java 或 Web 界面開發經驗。
2. 熟悉物件導向程式設計、資料庫（MySQL）、及以下某些技能: React JS, AJAX, Java Script, JQuery, OSM(openstreetmap) API, Google Earth API/Cesium, Spring Framework, Linux shell.
3. 正向、積極的態度

============
Requirements in English:

We are looking for a highly motivated and talented Java Web software engineer. As a part of the core software team, You will be responsible for developing world-class web-based software platform, that will support mobile operators better improve their network and enable various applications.

You will be working closely with various cross-functional teams like radio access engineers, PM, QA, research to gather requirements, analyze software system requirements, and successfully complete your tasks.

You will be working closely with field engineers to handle customer issues.

Extensive software development experience including sustaining and new product development is a must. Some amount of travel is involved.

* Required Qualifications:
- 1+ years of software development experience in web development or Java.
- Familiar with Object Oriented Programming.
- Familiar with database (MySQL).
- Familiar with some of the following: AJAX, Java Script, JQuery, OSM(openstreetmap) API, Google Earth API/Cesium, Spring Framework, Linux shell.
- BS or greater, preferably in Computer Science, Electrical / Electronics Engineering or a related field.
- Self-motivated, with positive attitude, a fast learner and team player, and fluent in English.
 

* Desired Qualifications:
- Telecommunication knowledge is a big plus.
- Practical experience with Apache Spark is a plus

job_lists.title: 【大安】50-60K 軟體測試工程師(應畢可)－企業管理APP新創公司＿ITS_854
job_lists.company: 藝珂人事顧問股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
【公司介紹】
一間為便利的創新科技而生。致力研發拓展事業版圖的各種科技產品。提供企業對於節省成本，培育人才，或精準管理達到最佳效率。公司擁有極佳團隊默契，產品皆為公司優秀的研發團隊歷經多時所創之結晶。團隊經驗豐富，成長快速，公司資源豐足，也希望網羅各地好手與我們共同深耕蓬勃。

【薪資】
50-60K

【人員要求】
工作1-3年經驗，應屆畢業生可。

【工作介紹】
Experience in software testing, from requirement analysis, to functional test design and execution, to test analysis and reporting

* Apply and contribute to evolving robust Agile approach to QA
* Work closely with development and product owners as part of a highly effective delivery team
* Work directly with developers to develop automation frameworks to measure performance and quality of components
* Produce, maintain, and execute a robust set of non-functional automation tests to challenging deadlines
* Conduct testing using company-specific automated processes
* Provide estimates for work to be undertaken
* Provide timely and accurate reports to QA manager and project teams
* Analyze and report on results of testing
* Report and track defects through to completion
* Assist in management, maintenance, and monitoring of test environments

【Skills】
功能測試(function test)、使用者測試(Usability test)、問題追蹤處理(Bug tracking)、軟體整合測試、測試環境建置規劃、壓力測試(stress test)、測試計劃及測試報告書撰寫、資料庫程式設計、資料庫軟體應用、電子試算表軟體操作、簡報軟體操作
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

※ 本職缺為玄力科技之招募職缺 (玄力科技為捷創科技之關係企業)

【玄力科技】
• 公司概況：
台灣玄力科技為捷創公司的關係企業，是美國Datiphy Inc. 的子公司。Datiphy Inc.總部位於美國加州矽谷的聖荷西市(San Jose, California)。台灣玄力科技台北辦公室位於松江路，目前公司部門包含研發部、品管部、技術支援部、及業務銷售部門。

• 公司營運：
玄力科技主要針對客戶的資料庫數據運算和大規模資料傳輸提供全面性的稽核服務。玄力科技創新研發的解決方案” Big Audit’，靈活整合了公司業務面和技術面的資訊，為複雜的商業營運帶來更精確及安全的商業運作模式。目前玄力科技已經在＂Big Audit＂ 的技術範疇中，領先拿到了五項美國的發明專利獎。另外還有六項專利正在核准中。

• 誠聘嚮往高科技服務業的同好：
你相信科技可以改變生活品質，創造人類幸福嗎？作為矽谷高科技公司的成員，我們目前正在積極尋找有活力、敢創新、思慮周密、專業細心的人才加入我們的團隊，與我們一同努力、成長。

Overview
At Datiphy Inc, we pride ourselves on building a complete solution for fast growing Big Data security and auditing markets worldwide. We value our engineers their team spirit, professional expertises, can-do attitude, and passion on learning new technology. Candidates with experiences at all levels are considered.

Job Requirements
We looks for innovatives. Other useful skills include.HTML, Python, PHP, JavaScript, JSON, Ajax, Bootstrap, D3, git, wiki, CherryPy, HTTP, HTTPs, REST, and excellent written and verbal communication.

Compensation
Depends on experience, ability, and potential

job_lists.title: NO.C264946J008/B IM · WebGL前端開發工程師
job_lists.company: 104China代企業徵聘人才
job_lists.content:
產業類別：建築·建材·工程

資格要求
1. 職務經驗：具有較強的電腦軟體開發能力。
2. 產業經驗：建築
3. 大陸經驗：不限
4. 其他要求：
1） 熟練使用HTML5, CSS，JavaScript, Autodesk Forge，Three.js, Bootstrap, JQuery, React.js，VS.NET，Eclipse或NetBeans等開發環境；熟練掌握java,C#，C/C++等語言一種或多種；掌握Structs+Spring+MyBatis等框架和開發技術；
2） 熟悉流行的BIM 軟體，具有BIM 或Web3D 產品開發工作經驗者優先；
3） 工作認真負責、積極主動，服務意識強；
4） 具有較強的學習能力、溝通能力、組織協調能力和良好的團隊協作精神。 

背景要求
5. 學歷：大學及以上學歷
6.     科系：土木工程或電腦相關專業（研究助理職位需研究生學歷）
7. 語言：不限

薪酬福利
8. 基本月薪：最終薪資由企業方根據面試情況而訂。
9. 福利補貼：依企業規定

工作職責：
1、與項目相關人員進行技術溝通，明確BIM研發與軟體發展的設計任務；
2、完成BIM研發成果的節點工作、解決專案具體問題並可提高專案工作效率與進度；
3、研發BIM軟體的實施成果能在項目實際的運用中多處解決問題；
4、更新和整理BIM研發相關資料及時歸檔；
5、負責其階段性成果向上級主管領導彙報；
6、負責完成領導交代的其他工作。







溫馨提示:若您在投遞簡歷後的30天未接到/收到本公司的任何電話/郵件形式的面試通知，確定您暫時不符合本公司的職位要求，還望海涵。

如需瞭解更多詳細資料，請聯繫客服：姜曉燕/Jane。




企業簡介：
集團總部位於英國，2007 深圳設立了集團分支機搆。集團在福田區擁有占地2100平米的辦公空間, 彙集來自美國，英國、荷蘭、菲律賓、加拿大和國內等地的設計師共200 多名, 是以規劃、建築、景觀、室內為一體化綜合性設計公司，透過高效的OA 辦公系統和人性化的管理，集團能為客戶根據不同專案提供全方位的貼心服務。

我們的使命
專注于圖紙，為客戶創造超越期望的價值。
我們的價值觀
極為注重整體和細節刻畫；通過互助、創造性、大膽的想像，不斷超越自己的成績並持續超越客戶的期望；嚴格控制、努力保持“高水準設計者”的形象。
我們的四大核心優勢：
概念創意先鋒
創意為端，境由念生。概念為設計之魂，鬱金香重視調查地段的特質和文脈，因地制宜、以靈感啟動其內蘊；帶著理念去思考，帶著思考去執行，向客戶提供最為合適的方案，務求體現項目的獨特個性並凸創，以領行業之先。
客戶自選團隊
跨界組合，團隊致勝。我們擁有資深的國內外設計師、工程師和藝術家資源，提供功能表式團隊組合，客戶可以根據具體的專案需求， 組成個性化服務團隊。
成本控制專家
精選材質，彰顯價值。鬱金香提倡使用價格合理的材料, 塑造高品質的設計效果，在合理控制成本的前提下，利用適當的形式語言和表現去觸動觀者，提升項目內在價值。以全面及時的價格資訊庫作為選料基礎，鬱金香為客戶實現“投入低於預算的成本，收穫超乎預期的價值。”
主動的全程服務
以客為上，專注服務。從規劃、設計、選材到施工現場，鬱金香均有設計師和工程師參與把控，利用公司內部《專案進程服務管理系統》預見性發現問題並及時解決設計問題，適時提供派駐現場的服務，為最終效果的有效實現主動把控。

job_lists.title: Systems Engineer( (This position is for NI's subsidiary Micropross)
job_lists.company: 美商_國家儀器股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
About Micropross
Established in 1979, Micropross is the leading company in the supply of test solutions for RFID, smartcart and Near Field Communication (NFC). The company is driven by a spirit of innovation and dedication to customer care.
Micropross has proven expertise in the design of laboratory and manufacturing test tools which are considered as references in their domains. These tools allow users to fully characterize and test the electrical and protocol performance of products such as smartcards and smartphones in design, conformance and production.
In late 2015, National Instruments acquired Micropross, this acqusition is key in placing NI as a leader in wireless test, rounding out our wireless standards coverage to include a full hardware and software solution for Near Field Communication and Wireless Charging. It will also strengthen Micropross ability to invest, compete and win in large scale production opportunities while allowing them to accelerate their development and strengthen their leadership position in NFC and Wireless Charging

Position Overview and Responsibilities 
Micropross(MP), a National Instruments Company has an immediate opening for a talented, experienced Field Technical Resource, in the (location – NI Office Taipei).
As an MP Field Technical Resource, you will work for the leading supplier of test equipment in Near Field Communicatoins (NFC), contact & contactless payment, RFID and Wireless Power areas.  This is a technical, yet also highly collaborative role where you will work closely with both the Micropross and NI sales teams.  This may include working on large opportunities across your territory, as well as focusing on platform proficiency and adoption efforts at top tier accounts. 

Responsibilities 
- Work closely with the MP and NI Field Sales in team selling engagements, to accelerate the qualification (go/no-go decision) process and drive selected opportunities to tech close
- Analyze customer application requirements for completeness and provide insight into the technical complexity of the task
- Advanced support of large system customers to ensure customer success utilizing MP tools
- Configuration of MP systems and software architecture to meet customer application needs 
- Complete performance benchmarks and prove application concepts on MP tools using Micropross MPManager, the Micropross API or NI LabVIEW and NI TestStand
- Perform competitive analysis of MP products to competitor products
- Engage in training and support of NI Alliance Members and Integrators
- Develop software proof of concepts and reuse content, etc.
- Provide consulting services such as application start-up assistance, system installation, and bring up deployment support both remote and on-site at a customer facility
- Travel to support various customers across a geographic region
- Demonstrate professionalism as you are working in a customer-facing role
- Providing oral or written feedback to marketing and R&D on our products, competitor’s products, and third party products
job_lists.other_condition:
- Native Chinese language
- Taiwanese citizenship
- Bachelors in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or Computer Science
- 2+ years of general programming experience, NI LabVIEW preferred
- 2+ years in a customer-facing role
- Flexibility – adaptable to changing responsibilities, availability to travel
- Strong presentation, demonstration, and project management skills
- Self-management – ability to drive tasks to completion with little or no supervision 
- Organization – ability to prioritize time and coordinate with others to achieve effective results 
- Team orientation – ability to influence others without control
- English Language Competency and effective oral and written communication skills – clearly and concisely communicate in English so that persons and customers you work with can understand you clearly, particularly in technical conversations

job_lists.title: QA Intern, Frontend Development (兼職前端測試工程師)
job_lists.company: CatchPlay_英屬蓋曼群島商威望國際娛樂股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
CATCHPLAY is looking for a graduate to join our frontend QA team. If you are passionate about technology and user satisfaction, and you are constantly trying new things, you may find joy working and learning with us!

Ideally you will be able to join as a part-time (min 20 hrs a week) or full-time intern for at least 3 months.

Responsibilities 
You will be guided by experienced quality engineers who will set up testing plans and testing cases for you. You will be following the guidance in testing products ranging from WEB, Mobile to TV APPs. Acting as a gate keeper of our products for each release, you’ll ensure users will have smooth experience watching movies on our services.
job_lists.other_condition:
Experience

1. Computer science or related degree preferred
2. Programming experience for any website or applications is required (non-commercial purpose is ok)
3. Great time management
4. Great team player

Language
1. Advanced Mandarin
2. Advanced English in reading and writing
3. Bahasa Indonesian is desirable but not required

We would love it if you are a MOVIE LOVER!

job_lists.title: Quality Engineer, Frontend Development (前端測試工程師)
job_lists.company: CatchPlay_英屬蓋曼群島商威望國際娛樂股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
CATCHPLAY is looking for a highly motivated Quality Engineer to join our frontend QA team. If you are passionate about technology and user satisfaction, and you are keen in delivering top-notch products to users, this might be a right role for you.

Responsibilities 

You will be working in a fast-paced product development environment. Working as a gate keeper, you’ll ensure our products delivered to users has great quality and usability. This will be done through conducting a series of different types of testing depending on test purposes and planning, such as functional test, sanity test, regression test and installation testing. Apart from spending at least half of your time conducting manual testing, you should feel as comfortable building automated test script together with the team to ensure efficient procedures are in place for best risk management.
job_lists.other_condition:
Experience

1. 2+ year consumer application QA experience
2. 2+ year experience with test planning and test case writing.
3. Experience with WEB, Android and iOS APP automation test script development is desirable but not a must. 
4. Familiar with at least Java or JavaScript.
5. Aware of automation tools such as Selenium and Appium.  
6. Comfortable with both manual testing and automation. 
7. Great communication skills including test case writing and test reporting in English
8. Familiar with Scrum process is a plus
9. Great time management
10. Great team player

We would love it if you are a MOVIE LOVER!

job_lists.title: Sr. Software QA Engineer, Smart Zone Management (170574)
job_lists.company: (Ruckus Wireless) 美商優科無線股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Looking for Software QA Engineers capable of designing, developing, executing and automating test cases in 802.11 wireless products based on IEEE standards. 


- The candidates should be capable to develop and document detail test plans based on the functional and technical specifications.
- Good communication skills to interact with developers, customer supports and field engineers are required.
- This position requires a minimum of 7 years of QA Engineering, network design, software, or systems test resulting in the successful delivery of quality Wi-Fi products.
- Experiences with LAN, L2/L3 Switch, Routing protocols, TCP/IP, NAT, IGMP v2/v3, QoS, wireless security, SNMP, Firewall, and WiFi Hotspot; and familiar with packet analyzers such as Sniffer, EtherPeek, EtherReal, AiroPeek, Wireshark, and be able to analyze the captured data.
- Experiences with IxChariot and IxVeriWave.
- Experience with testing lab planning, IPv6, Linux & Authentication servers setup is a plus.
- Must possess a BS or BA in CS, EE, IS, Math or equivalent.
- Any other network certification is a plus.
- Preferably the current/last working employment is related to networking equipment verification (網通產品測試工程師)

job_lists.title: Software Engineer, AP (170089)
job_lists.company: (Ruckus Wireless) 美商優科無線股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Ruckus Wireless has been singularly focused on wireless performance and we continue to lead the industry in performance innovation. We have never relied on off-the-shelf, reference design technology – it just doesn’t deliver the capacity, range or interference mitigation necessary to make the dream of high performance wireless a reality. Instead, we’ve assembled a team of the best and brightest wireless minds in the world to deliver the creative solutions needed to realize our vision of delivering best Wi-Fi and this is your opportunity to join us!

You will play a key role in developing the next generation of Ruckus Wireless Access Points using future generations of Wi-Fi chipsets. This is an opportunity to work on multi-core leading edge SoC and make a high impact while working with a small team of developers.

Responsibilities
•Customize the Linux kernel and drivers for existing and new Access Points which use single-core and multi-core CPUs.
•Analyze and trace existing code as required to diagnose and resolve issues related to functionality, performance and stability.
•Work in a small, focused team to build the next generation of Access Point platforms.

Position Requirements
•4+ years of experience developing and debugging embedded Linux kernel software and drivers
•Solid understanding and experience developing software for single- and multi-core CPUs
•2+ years of experience in networking products development
•Thorough knowledge and experience in embedded Linux development, debug and problem solving skills
•Embedded Linux development for PPC, MIPS and ARM platforms and board support packages
•Solid understanding on basic networking protocols, including layer 2 bridging, layer 3 routing, VLAN, TCP/IP, DHCP, ARP, DNS, NAT, RADIUS accounting, 802.1X based authentication, security, and scripting languages
•Enthusiasm in programming, good understanding in C Language is required
•Experience with 802.11/Wi-Fi driver development is preferred
•Communication skill in English
•Experience with providing a solid platform to application developers
•Experience with integrating open-source packages in the system
•Performance, load and stress benchmarking and testing
•BS/BA in CS/EE or equivalent
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.company: (Ruckus Wireless) 美商優科無線股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Ruckus Wireless has an immediate opening position for a Software QA Engineer in our Taipei Development Center.  The candidate need be capable of designing, developing, executing, scripting test cases and perform performance tests in wireless products based on IEEE standards.

 Position Requirements
•The candidates should be capable to develop and document detail test plans based on the functional and performance specifications.
•Good communication skills with coworkers.
•This position requires a minimum of 3 years of QA engineering, software test or systems test resulting in the successful delivery of quality network products.
•Excellent in layer 2 and layer 3 network devices configuration and familiar with packet analyzers to analyze the captured data.
•Excellent in Linux server setup, system administration and familiar with shell scripts or python.
•Excellent in volume, performance, stress testing tools and methodologies.
•Excellent in network / system integration and troubleshooting.
•Excellent in functional spec. review and provide test suggestions.
•Excellent in problem solving and performance tuning on systems.
•Any Python or Java certification is a plus.
•Any Linux or network certification is a plus.
•Must possess a BS or BA in CS, EE, IS, Math or equivalent.

job_lists.title: 【相關經驗佳】手機遊戲設計工程師 Senior Mobile Game Programmer
job_lists.company: 易銘有限公司
job_lists.content:
【你渴望做出風靡全球的Mobile Game嗎？Orangenose Studio幫助你達成夢想！】
Orangenose Studio 是一個小而富有創造力的團隊，致力於開發 iOS 和 Android 平台上的休閒小遊戲，我們的目標是讓玩家容易上手，卻愛不釋手。歡迎你加入我們，一同不斷實驗，研發最具娛樂效果的 Mobile Game，帶給每一個人最棒的娛樂體驗  ! 
 
工作基本要求：
1.擅長Unity，熟悉C#尤佳！
2.英文讀、寫能力精通，能充分理解第三方之官方SDK文件內容！
3.以「產品」為導向，不執著於個人對遊戲的喜好或偏見，能與團隊夥伴充分合作，以做出熱銷全世界的手機遊戲！
 
你該有的特質：
【希望工作結合興趣，不視工作僅為工作】
對Mobile Game充滿憧憬及熱情！熱愛“輕度”、“大眾化”的歐美休閒類遊戲者尤佳！
**喜好並想設計深度遊戲者(ex.角色扮演類、經營模式類、戰略攻城類等)請勿投遞
 
【熱愛學習，以做該領域的專家】
對於指派的項目有高度責任感並願意花時間鑽研，以求成為該項目的專家以指導他人。
 
【目標取向，具強烈企圖心】
自我要求高，主動追求高品質的工作成果及高效率的工作方式，以目標為取向！
 
【心思細膩、變化度高，完美詮釋遊戲體驗】

【對工作、對夥伴、對公司擁有夢想】

job_lists.company: 新加坡商立可人事顧問有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Senior Software Engineer

1.熟手機SW, 但要有照相機模組的經驗，照相機模組占未來工作比重20%

2.能接受到中國出差

3.能以英文技術溝通

 

We’re looking for an experienced and self-motivated software project manager to join our team. The ideal candidate shall also have certain level of communication skills to work with teams located in different countries.

 

Job Description:

- Execute product software development with ODM SW teams through product lifecycle; from product design phase to mass production, maintenance releases, and to aftersales supporting.

- Ensuring software delivery on time with expected level of quality and required specifications.

- Continuously improving software performance and quality, by collecting lessons learnt and studying competitor and market pioneer products.

 

Main Roles and Responsibilities:

1. Product software requirement analysis and interpretation. Closely discuss with ODM teams and conduct feasibility study. Locking down software specifications for feature implementation. Set up correct expectation of feature complete stage internally.

2. Set up software milestones with ODM. Monitor and achieve them throughout product cycle.

3. Clarifying and prioritizing software issues and help ODM to resolve them effectively.

4. Provide ongoing software support post from ship acceptance and be the technical interface between the ODM partners and other groups within Bullitt Group.

5. Review the software capabilities of potential new ODM partners and provide reports and opinions on the risks and benefits of the potential partners.

 

Essential Skills and Experience:

- Software engineering experiences is a must. With strong knowledge of software development life cycle, software quality assurance and methodology.

- Better to have relative working experiences in and not limited to Android or Windows Mobile platform and involved in the whole product life cycle.

- Experiences on Camera HAL, 3A, image quality tuning is a PLUS.

- Good communication skill. Must demonstrate verbal and written skills to communicate effectively with cross functional teams including Product, Presale, Customer Service and management teams.

- Strong to fluent English writing and speaking ability. Capability of writing design documents.

- Experiences with ODM/OEM working model is a plus.

- Experiences with collaborating with different sites and time zones is a plus. 
 

CV to nicole@recruitexpress.com.tw

job_lists.title: Principal Software Engineer C++
job_lists.company: TomTom Asia_通騰科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Our office is just opposite to the Taipei Main station! 
Take it easy in the morning, arrival anytime before 10AM is ok.

In Taipei we are looking for a (Agile) C++ developer to join our Qt Navigation UI team. TomTom is the leading Agile software development company in Taiwan.
 
Here are some of the user stories we work on
• As a driver, I want to avoid road block ahead of my route.
• As a developer, I want to have Arabic framework for right to left reading.
• As a driver, I want to have online parking availability information.

What’s a must
• Amazing C++ coding, framework, architecture, design skills and passion to learn more.
• Be proactive and like to make decisions.
• Speak your mind, ask questions and share ideas. Even when people do not ask, you like to share what you know.

What’s nice to have
• Good object-orientated software design abilities.
• Experience with creating rich GUI applications by using Qt technologies.
• Knowledge of modern UI framework (Android, iOS, HTML5).
• Know how to develop on Linux and cross-platform development.
• Professional experience in using unit test frameworks.
• Thorough understanding of the intricacies and pitfalls of multithreaded programming.
• Analytical skills to determine and improve the testability of development deliverables and to find root causes and solutions for detected issues.

What can you expect from us
• Freedom, fun, no hierarchy!
• The opportunity to get paid as a manager, yet work hands-on as an expert developer.
• We move fast like a “start-up” but have the benefits of a billion euro company. 
• Team outings, innovation days, indefinite contract, flexible benefits, minimum 15 annual leave days, statutory insurances, group insurance, health check,  pension scheme, up to 50% discount on products, bonus scheme and International relocation package (if applicable).

We have been making built-in car navigation since 2008, introduced the connected car in 2010 and are a major player in the area of highly automated driving. And, we are not slowing down. Join us

Please apply through www.tomtom.com/careers. The reference to this job is 24471.

Pre-employment screening and coding tests of all external candidates is part of the selection process. Feel free to send us a piece of code to show your skills.
job_lists.other_condition: 未填寫

job_lists.title: Team Lead Who Codes (Scrum Master)
job_lists.company: TomTom Asia_通騰科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
How about joining the most advanced Agile Software Development company in Taiwan? Our Navigation Engine team is looking for an enthusiastic Associate Scrum Master who can support us to achieve more. With us Agile is not just a simple daily stand up or a sprint planning, it’s in our culture, it’s in our DNA.

A Associate Scrum Master at TomTom is a curious Software Engineer who cares about continuous improvement, craftmanship and has the capacity to influence others. You are a host leader who can think beyond the standard Agile, Scrum, Kanban, XP, Scrumban textbook examples. You are aware that Agile is rather a mindset instead of a set of Scrum rituals. More importantly you recognise yourself in all of the following 6 attributes: responsible, humble, collaborative, commited, influential, knowledgeable. Because you like technology and people, your dream job is a combination of both.

In short we are looking for a multiplier who:

·         Act as catalyst for continuous improvement so that we deliver products we are proud of.

·         Has passion for clean, easy to read and maintainable C++ code.

·         Has good object-orientated software design abilities.

·         Speak your mind, ask questions and share ideas.

·         Has great observation, facilitating and influencing skills

·         Tries out new things non stop and is not afraid to fail

What can you expect from us

·      With more than 150 Agile teams worldwide we have plenty of experience to share with you.

·      A complete Agile environment with all Agile roles, whiteboards, sticky notes, poker cards, lego etc.

·      A collaborative, entrepeneurial and fail friendly culture

·      Our office is just opposite to the Taipei Main station! Take it easy in the morning, any time before 10AM is ok.

·      Team outings, innovation days, indefinite contract, flexible benefits, minimum 15 annual leave days, collective health insurance, health check pension scheme, up to 50% discount on products, bonus scheme.

WE ARE NAVIGATION AND MORE: Wearable Technology, Action Cameras, Mobile Applications, Portable Navigation Devices, Automotive Components, Fleet Management Systems, Location Technology Products, Real Time Traffic, Map Information, Navigation Services, and Licensing. Five years from now we will be active in areas we haven’t yet dreamed of.

If you would like to be part of this winning team and would like to help us further position ourselves as the authority in location and navigation solutions, please apply today!

Pre-employment screening of all external candidates is part of the selection process.

job_lists.content:
Our office is just opposite to the Taipei Main station! Take it easy in the morning, anytime before 10AM is ok.

We are the leading Agile software development company in Taiwan. In Taipei we are looking for a Software Test Analyst who enjoys breaking the systems.

What will you do

• Test planning & test case design, in Story- Feature- and System Levels

What’s nice to have

What can you expect from us

job_lists.title: Android Developer /Android 軟體工程師
job_lists.company: 集邦科技股份有限公司_TRENDFORCE
job_lists.content:
Job Description 

We are looking for an Android developer responsible for the development and maintenance of applications aimed at a vast number of diverse Android devices. Your primary focus will be the development of Android applications and their integration with back-end services. You will be working along-side other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and creating quality products is essential.


Responsibilities 

●Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code
●Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Java code
●Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
●Investigate and resolve performance issues, bottlenecks, and inefficiencies
●Write clean, maintainable code while rapidly iterating and shipping
● Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs

Skills And Qualifications 

●Strong knowledge of Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices
●A deep understanding of core software concepts, including networking, storage/file system, security, memory management, multi-threading, and application life cycle management.
●Proficiency with Android Studio and Gradle.
●Experience working with RESTful server-side APIs
●Experience with modern architectures such as MVVM and dependency injection
●Familiarity with MySQL/SQLite databases and their declarative query languages
●Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
●Experience developing and releasing apps into Google Play


Minimum Qualifications: 

●2+ years of experience of Android development, Reactive programming (example: Rx), Kotlin a big plus
●Experience in RDBMS (e.g., MySQL, SQLite) (over 2 years)

Your primary focus will be development of iOS applications and their integration with back-end services. Job Description

We are looking for a C# developer responsible for building C# applications, including anything from back-end services to their client-end counterparts. Your primary responsibilities will be to design and develop these applications, and to coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is essential.

●Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization

Skills

8.Proficient understanding of code versioning tools (such as Git, SVN, and Mercurial)

job_lists.title: 公司內部IT部門APP開發(IOS)工程師-知名半導體裝置製造商【日商．日文・彈性上下班制・福利超優渥！】(11681)
job_lists.company: 立樂高園股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
具體的工作內容:
・為了使公司內部的工作達到效率化、系統化，所以進行APP的開發。
主要任務:讓外勤業務也可以用智慧型手機順利地工作。
例如:公司報告用的APP開發、出缺勤管理的APP開發 等。
・系統主要以日方為主，所以台灣、日本之間會有一些合作機會。

現在IT部門有3名在職員工(主管1人、系統工程師2人)。
因為公司內部要進行系統IT化，所以需要招募新的人材。

公司概要:
日本總公司在1940年的東京成立。是東京證券交易所第一部的上市公司，也是矽晶片(silicon wafer)加工機器的龍頭企業。
2007年以日本100%的子公司型態來台設立。

福利制度:
・週休二日、國定假日
・語言津貼
・員工旅遊
・彈性上下班制
  (主要的工作時間:10:00-15:00)
・定期舉辦公司交流活動(如運動會、各式社團、家庭日 等)
・各種保險制度完備
・進公司第一年有9天特休假
・設有健身房、淋浴間
・通勤津貼
年終獎金:依實際業績調整
※薪資可依照工作經驗、能力面議調整。
job_lists.other_condition:
必須條件:
經驗:IOS開發的經驗
技能:  ・程式設計的相關基本知識
       　・IT的知識
       　・日文or英文/日常會話程度

歡迎:
・了解PHP和MySQL(或者是PostgreSQL)
・有IOS APP的開發經驗
・有多數人所使用的網頁附加元件之開發經驗
・有Linux指示的管理經驗

★推薦給具有以下特質的人★
・想要在穩定的環境下長期工作的人。
・不會逃避問題，會想辦法努力解決的人。
・具有良好的溝通能力。

■若為應屆畢業生，主修是相關科系者，或有IOS APP的開發經驗者亦可！
■歡迎居住在日本想回國工作的台灣人！
