job_lists.title: DevOp/Backend Engineer
job_lists.company: Tomofun_友愉股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
・About the role:
    Does working on the generation architecture and application development get you motivated? Furbo Engineering is a high-performance culture marked by fearlessness and hyper-productivity. This position offers a great opportunity to work with other senior engineers on our flagship and supporting products. We have been building a great product for years and are looking to innovate even further. We are looking for prolific engineers to join our engineering team and continue revolutionizing the heart of our platform.
We're seeking strong Backend engineers looking to use their knowledge of building scalable, robust, and fault-tolerant services that support our unique rate-of-growth requirement. If you're excited about cloud development, committed to thoughtful architecture design, and like tackling problems of unprecedented scale on a small, fast-moving team, you'll fit right in here.
 
・About the company:
    At Tomofun, we LOVE pets and technology. Our vision is to bring joy and innovation to every pet lover in the world. Headquartered in Taiwan, we’re building a one-of-a-kind global company that helps pets and pet parents stay connected through our innovative products. Our pioneer product, Furbo Dog Camera, is the #1 best selling pet camera on Amazon US, Canada, UK, and Japan. The learning curve is steep. But the work is exhilarating. Tomofun is on the cusp on a pet-tech boom and we’re looking for smart, innovative thinkers who aspire to incredible things.
 
・What you’ll do:
  - Developing backend services
  - Design, maintain and scale our big data acquisition infrastructure
  - Assess the root cause of problem reports, replicate the situation in a test environment,
    and deploy fixes to production
  - Propose new ways and technologies for automation
  - Implement proper monitoring and alerts for running services
 
・Who you are:
   - You're an experienced developer in Python, Restful APIs, NoSQL/SQL, other scripting languages, Linux and have the confidence to easily pick up others
  - You've had production level experience designing / deploying / administering applications
     in the cloud
  - You love to embrass cutting edge techniques: AWS, docker container, Elasticsearch and so on
  - You've worked in a high-availability environment, providing 24x7 SaaS service
  - You have experience with the CI/CD process and promoting code from development
     environments into production
- You are experienced with monitoring production infrastructure systems and skilled at
    setting notification thresholds
- You follow test-driven development methods and take pride in your code
- You possess excellent written and verbal communication skills
- You possess excellent analytical and troubleshooting skills
- Able to communicate freely in both English and Mandarin with your team
job_lists.other_condition:
・Required tools：
Linux
Plus: AWS, Docker container, Kubernetes, Database knowledge (NoSQL/SQL)

・Required skills：
Python(flask)
Plus: good to have other developing experience in different languages, e.g. Java, GO, Node.js ... etc

job_lists.title: Performance Architect/ Engineer (E1955377)
job_lists.company: Qualcomm Taiwan Corporation_台灣高通股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Responsibilities
The main responsibility of this position is to model, analyze, project, and improve the performance of world-class microprocessor for mobile and portable computers. The potential areas to work include
• Function and performance model development
• Performance projection and competitive analysis
• Micro-architecture exploration and design trade-offs study
• Performance validation and bottleneck analysis
• Benchmark and workload characterization
• Architecture enhancement research

Minimum Qualifications
• Ph.D. degree in Electrical/Computer Engineering or Computer Science with emphasis on computer architecture and performance analysis
• Deep knowledge on in-order/out-of-order CPU microarchitecture
• Understand the method of developing performance models
• Proficient in C/C++ and scripting programming 
• Good communicator both in verbal and in writing (English)

Preferred Qualifications
• Hands-on experience with microarchitecture modeling and simulator development
• Experience in benchmark/workload characterization and/or performance bottleneck analysis
• Familiarity with computing software, including operating systems, hypervisors, drivers, etc.

job_lists.title: BMC Engineer - Hyve Solutions
job_lists.company: 海峰電腦股份有限公司
job_lists.content: Come join the firmware engineering team at Hyve! Hyve Solutions specializes in providing our customers with purpose-built data center servers and solutions. Help us design server platforms at scale.PRINCIPAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES (ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS)This is a BMC Engineering position within the Hyve Solutions – Taipei City, Engineering Team. In this position, you will be responsible for defining, testing, delivering and documenting for Hyve Solutions products, supporting the next generation of Hyve Solutions roadmap. You will be responsible for authoring IPMI Firmware specifications, executing unit test and debugging/troubleshooting potential issues. You will be working closely OEM/ODM vendor and be responsible for all software and firmware related issues during the planning, development, and validation stages of the program. Your responsibilities will include but not be limited to: - Designing, documenting and debugging IPMI firmware. - Working with platform engineer and services team to provide support for pre-sales/post- sales activities. - Learn, analyze and implement new interfaces and subsystems, break down complex issues and collaborate across cross-functional teams to resolve issues in a timely manner.
job_lists.other_condition: MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS :You must possess a minimum of a Bachelor degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science and/or Engineering in a related field with more than three years of firmware and/or software development experience. Additional qualifications include: * Familiar with ASPEED BMC architecture (AST2300/2400/2500) * Familiar with interfaces SMBUS, SPI, IPMB, UART, PECI 3.0 and LPC * Working knowledge of IPMI firmware vendor (AMI) and code structure,ability to define and identify the specific IPMI firmware requirements * Familiar with IPMI 2.0 spec * Familiar with PMBUS 1.2 spec * Strong C/C++ coding skills * Excellent system-level debugging skills - Ability in organizing and managing multiple projects, setting priorities and working independently under aggressive timelines * Good English speaking and literacy - Good communication and documentation skillsNICE TO HAVE: * Experience with networking device development is plus. (e.g, switch, router) * Experience with network protocol UDP, ARP, SNMP, SYSLOG and NCSI are plus * Experience with USB device driver

1.專案開發：
每個耀欣服務的客戶都是一個專案，在系統面雖有一套基礎的倉儲管理系統，但每個客戶的物流中心都有著不同的作業空間、不同的自動化程度、不同的作業流程、不同的管理模式，因此，每個專案需求變化多，都需要系統工程師為每一個專案做相當程度的客製化開發。

3.熟悉各行業物流特性與物流領域知識，未來往系統分析師(SA／SD)發展。

能配合專案開發時程彈性配合工作

job_lists.title: Systems Engineer
job_lists.company: 英屬開曼群島商易智能股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description:
AMPOS is looking for Operations Engineers to support the deployment of a robust, scalable operational
infrastructure that will enable AMPOS to quickly and efficiently scale up to meet the needs of our multi billion 
dollar market. There is no red-tape, political infighting or endless meetings here. We move fast and have fun. 
Your sole focus will be helping to get the ERM product to our customers quickly and efficiently with the best
 quality possible.

Responsibilities:
- Research and develop automated scripts/tools to assist in customer solution deployment and validation
- Assist in developing and implementation of deployment plan.
- Validation of deployed instances as well as post new release validation
- Work with Dev and QA teams to deploy and troubleshoot the system applications.
- Develop deployment support documentations for customers.
- Work with the management to develop deployment specifications and configurations.
- Analyze and troubleshoot deployment issues in a timely manner.
- Act as primary contact for deployment related inquiries and issues.

Required experience and skills:
- 3+ years of QA/Development experience
- 2+ years Java development experience
- Working experience with databases such as Oracle, Mysql or SQL Server
- Cross-platform experience and the expertise to identify and resolve integration issues
- Knowledge of system level and integration level testing
- Strong quality assurance background
- Excellent understanding of the continuous integration practice
- Proficiency in specifying and implementing testing and production environment infrastructure
- Expertise with automated testing products, including how to set up automated testing, how to script 
automated tests, how to create automated regression test suites, and how to troubleshoot automated
testing issues
- Understanding of the Release and Deployment Management processes
- Ability to work well with others on a team
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
- BS in Engineering/Computer Science or equivalent

Preferred Qualifications
- Experience in SaaS based Enterprise Software
- Experience working in Unix/Linux environments
- Scripting experience in python or other scripting language
- Experience with Atlassian products such as JIRA and Confluence is an advantage

job_lists.title: Performance Engineer
job_lists.company: 英屬開曼群島商易智能股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Performance Engineer with a passion to make cloud 
applications fast and efficient.  You will work with developers to test and optimize 
AMPOS ERM software pre and post-production, and also monitor and troubleshoot 
performance issues in production.  This is a technical, hands-on role for someone who 
is adept at gathering and analyzing performance data and finding the root cause of 
performance bottlenecks.

Responsibilities
• Collaborate with members of the Engineering team to solve performance problems
• Profile Java application performance using proven tools and techniques
• Monitor production performance and investigate issues
• Develop tools to automate performance monitoring
• Test and profile new features pre-production to make sure they will scale and perform
• Work closely with the product, design, engineering and the Robot Architect to 
ensure the full suite of performance goals are consistently benchmarked.
• Develop a Performance Test Plan/Strategy document that includes test objectives,
 types of tests required, workload matrix, scenarios, etc.
• Develop test scripts and load projections needed to simulate virtual users using
 performance testing tools.
• Analyze performance test results and co-ordinate with development teams to get 
performance issues fixed by providing sufficient explanation and impact analysis.

Qualifications 
• Proficiency with Java, MySql and scripting tools such as Python and Shell scripting
• Proficiency with Linux and the various tools and techniques used to debug 
performance problems from the OS all the way up to the highest level JavaScript
• Experience with cloud server performance testing and tools
• Experience translating performance requirements into performance scenarios 
for use in tools.
• Familiarity with Agile Scrum process.
• Ability and desire to learn new skills and technologies.
• Expert Level understanding of networked systems (TCP/IP, UDP, IP multicast)
• BS in engineering/science or equivalent

Preferred Qualifications 
• Familiarity with China network infrastructure and unique restrictions as well as limitations
• Knowledge of AWS

job_lists.title: Integration Programmer Analyst
job_lists.company: 英屬開曼群島商易智能股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description:
The Integration Programmer Analyst is responsible for designing, implementing, testing, and 
deploying solutions that enable the integrations between various SaaS based business and
 infrastructure applications.
 
The Analyst must be able to communicate well with user groups and define the integration 
needs. Has an ability to understand user requirements and translate them into a technical 
reality that is extendable and maintainable.
 
To succeed in this role, you must be able to work directly with a SaaS based data integration 
platform,  diagnose and resolve technical issues.

Responsibilities:
• Analyst who “owns” integration architecture, implementation, support and maintenance
• Analyze and understand the metadata and data structures of various SaaS applications.
• Review and understand data integration requirements and create functional prototypes
• Retrieve data from various sources and prepare data for integration
• Leverage standards based SOAP/REST APIs for communicating between applications.
• Write complex SQL queries against various data and application sources, including 
complex sub queries and nested queries toprepare data for integration
• Assist in troubleshooting difficult technical issues
• Stay current on data integration best practices
• Work in an agile manner; be flexible to changing priorities
• Communicate with user groups regarding status, technical issues and provide creative solutions.

Required experience and skills:
• Bachelors degree (preferably in Computer Science) and 4+ years of professional experience.
• Strong oral and written communication skills.
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
• Ability to work in a fast-paced culture
• Strong Data Integration Experience
• Strong SQL skills
• Hands on experience developing interfaces to SOAP, REST API based environments
• Knowledge of spreadsheet functionality including VLookups, Pivot tables
Preferred Qualifications
• Working knowledge of Business Intelligence Tools and Technologies.
• Experience with Data integration packages (E.g. TalenD, Boomi, Informatica, Mulesoft, etc.)
• Analytical Skills

job_lists.content:
Job Description:
AMPOS is looking for a Software Development Manager to build industry leading Enterprise 
Employee Relationship Management applications and services on our product platform.  There 
is no red-tape, political infighting or endless meetings here.  We move fast and have fun.  Your 
sole focus will be creating amazing software solutions for our customers in the Manufacturing 
and Hospitality industry to positively impact lives.
 
If you know how to build highly scalable, extensible platforms and applications 
we want to talk to you!

Responsibilities
  What will your day to day look like?
• Recruit, challenge, and reward high performance individuals that deliver 10x the impact 
of average engineers
• Provide leadership in iteratively defining & refining development processes as the team grows
• Work in an agile, small team environment within a highly successful Cloud company 
that is growing fast
• Directly collaborate with all product stakeholders and drive multiple features to successful delivery
• Be a trusted partner for senior management to determine best solutions, help drive 
alignment and implement decisions throughout your team 

    Qualities we value:
• Tenacity, technical brilliance and ability to contribute quickly
• Take pride in work through attention to detail
• Drive and flexibility to roll up your sleeves, work hard and have fun in a fast-moving environment
• Smart, quick learner, proactive, comfortable working with unknowns and dynamically 
evolving requirements
• Creativity and a self-starting willingness to explore new technologies

Qualifications 
• 2+ years of software engineering management experience using an agile development process
• 5+ years developing commercial software in Java
• Proven ability to hire, mentor, coach and lead a team to success
• Ability to motivate people, instill accountability and achieve results
• Expertise in object-oriented design and implementation
• Experience building application development tools, APIs, and/or enterprise application
 platform software
• Strong communication skills
• BS in engineering/computer science or equivalent
Preferred Qualifications 
• Experience with cloud based SaaS enterprise applications
• Demonstrated success in a startup mode
• Experience with the following server-side web technologies (Spring, JPA, Hibernate, Solr, etc.).
• Experience with RDBMS such as MySQL, Oracle or MS SQL Server
• Experience with virtualization technologies and infrastructure (e.g. AWS)

job_lists.title: 網站設計人員或軟體工程人員 Web Developers
job_lists.company: 美商無界創意工程有限公司
job_lists.content:
We are looking for clever and creative individuals who want to take part in a growing start up company to design systems for international customers. All of our clients share a common goal: To produce a more efficient and intelligent user experience.

These systems will be used in production, and our team is small, so individual responsibility and work ethic is important. We are looking for disciplined and motivated individuals who love to learn new technology.

Requirements: 
- Proficient in Javascript
- Proficient in HTML/CSS
- Can create code from scratch (especially CSS)
- Can use git source control
- Can work with a team
- Detail oriented and task focused
- Communicates regularly with teammates and higher management

Experience with any of the following is a plus: 
- SCSS
- git
- postgreSQL
- JQuery, AngularJS, NodeJS, BluebirdJS, Meteor, React

Work communication may be in a mix of English and Chinese, however the documentation for most recent (and required) technologies are only available in English.

We are a small group focused on producing results, but at the same time always learning and enjoying new technology. Work schedules, hours, holidays, can be flexible as long as communication is made in advance and you are dedicated to your project.

Our office is in Hualien, but working remotely or office collocation may be available for experienced/talented candidates.

Students and part-time workers may also apply

job_lists.content:
Job Summary:

We are now looking for a Solution Architect in Radio Access Network (RAN), who will be responsible for analyzing, designing and developing commercially viable end-to-end technical solutions for the customers. You are also expected to analyze, prepare, implement and verify the configuration and integration of RAN. Scope could include solution introduction, feature implementation, network upgrade and capacity expansion.

Responsibilities:
•Scope, define and design solution offerings; driving end-to-end technical solutions
•Analyze customer technology, define business requirements and participate in risk analysis
•Work with core team on list of potential activities and solutions
•Develop technical presentations and proposals, and perform customer presentations
•Support deployment of solution and provide feedback to R&D 
•Participate in knowledge transfer, documentation and information sharing 
•Stay abreast of on new technology/technical areas and share information about solution to enable customer competence build
•Plan and execute product configuration & integration work
•Prepare acceptance test and handover to customer

Key Qualifications:
•Degree holder in Telecommunication / Electronic Engineering / Information Technology or related discipline
•At least 7-year experience in Telecom industry with excellent knowledge in LTE and new technologies
•Good knowledge in the latest RAN & IP network topology principles & techniques
•Detailed knowledge and ongoing access to knowledge of system design and implemented functional characteristics

Additional Requirements:
•Willing to work under high pressure and taking initiative with good focus on problem solving
•Strong team-work across different functional teams locally, regionally and globally
•Pro-active and customer-oriented with good customer communication skills
•Fluent in spoken & written English and Chinese.

job_lists.title: 【日本工作】組み込み制御エンジニア＊skype面試 J20
job_lists.company: 立樂高園股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
韌體設計/軟體設計  工程師赴日工作！ 日幣20~40万円/月
工作簽證費用無料/提供初期租屋費用/前往日本機票
另外還有提供宿舍（二万円/月）外加免費日文進修


■面試地點:台灣/台北
■面試時間 ：7/15（六）
【職務內容】
汽車、醫療器材、工具機的整體開發／結構．框體．模具的設計、CAE(Computer Aided Engineering)的解析等。

【實際例子】
◆家電、汽車、輸送機械的概念設計業務

■需求條件: 
【必要條件】
從事過家電、汽車、輸送機械的嵌入式系統、控制系統相關開發的求職者
★不限領域以及年資

【次要條件】
■C、C++、組合語言（assembly language）等的嵌入式控制系統開發經驗
■家電等微電腦控制系統開發經驗
■架設網站、建構網路、資料庫程式設計經驗 
■系統檢測除錯經驗

【判定條件】
■有使用C語言的經驗
■除了網站架構外，亦有家電、汽車、機械類等，實體物件的嵌入式系統開發經驗。

【次要條件】 
◆資歷不深也歡迎來挑戰！
◆也歡迎已經畢業一段時間想要轉職的求職者(大學理工相關科系畢業)！
■語言程度要求
・N2以上。
（可以用日語溝通無礙的程度）
■年收
4,000,000～7,000,000日幣
（因經驗而不同）
■月薪制：22萬日幣~40萬日幣/月
※依能力、經驗而定，待遇優
■調薪：1年1次
■獎金：1年2次
【年収例】
400萬日幣／經驗5年、工程師、28歲／月薪25萬日幣
620萬日幣／經驗15年、專案經理、38歲／月薪41萬日幣
800萬日幣／經驗20年、首席工程師、42歲／月薪53萬日幣
■待遇/ 各項福利:
◆雇用型態：正式雇用(正社員)
◆各項補助：交通費全額支付　　　
◆假日、休假：
週休二日(六日以及國定假日※有國定假日時，該週六需上班）、年底假期、夏日假期、年假、婚喪特別假、特別假
年度假日共計123日(含特別假)
◆各項保險：健康保險、雇用保險、勞災保險、年金提撥
◆待遇福利：
薪水自動扣存制度
轉職赴任臨時補助金
返鄉旅費補助
宿舍・社有住宅制度
※1個月2~3萬日幣+水電瓦斯費用個人負擔
搬家費用補助
從業員持股會（有獎勵金）
工會
健康保險會
退休後再次雇用
函授課程教育補助
公司內外講習補助
讀書會講師費用補助
書籍購入補助
資格取得補助
公司外部技能研修參加費
自我啟發課程相關
學會參加費
協助自我啟發
■上班地點:
分發至日本全國各地的客戶製造商。（優先分發志願勤務地）
◆此職缺的優點：:
基於「唯有從業員個人的成長，才能帶動提供更高水準的服務」的理念，提供各項技能提升支援以及適合工作的環境。

【到目前為止的努力】
◆「敝司到目前為止致力研發的技術」＋「今後帶動國力向上的技術」
以客觀、有體系的方式，將以上敝司理念帶入獨創的「技術戰略地圖」，
明確定位工程師們的發展方向，以期能力、職務經驗累積的向上。

◆支援所有員工職務經驗累積的CDA(Career design advisor)制度。
提供教育課程、研修給敝司的工程師們，以期作為工程師的能力向上提升。

◆除了業務上必須的技能之外，亦提供提升人際關係、商業技能的充實教育研修制度。

◆設置「自我實現委員會」，以支援所有工程師達到自我所期許的工作姿態以及方式（即謂自我實現）

◆既可作為工程師努力工作，也可活用到目前為止的經驗轉戰其他職種。
考慮到員工各自的生涯規劃，提供轉換到不同職種的機會。

＊想赴日本工作冒險家精神者佳
＊日本打工度假畢業者佳
＊日本留學畢業生佳

job_lists.title: 雲端應用工程師
job_lists.company: 迎棧科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
如果你：
相信雲端運算是個趨勢，
認為軟體 License 將會是過去式，
瞭解分享在軟體社群有多重要，
參與過或認識自由軟體的開發，
並且有強烈的使命感要用 open source 來改變世界。

同時你願意鑽研：
linux 的基本操作、軟體的安裝和伺服器的架設，
虛擬化技術、Software-Defined Datacenter，
大型應用服務的建構技術，
最新的程式語言，
邏輯的表達與感性的訴求法。

而你平時：
經常在服務別人，
吃苦耐勞、卻很有生活品味，
虛懷若谷、一直在接受各方面最新的知識，
沒有固定的行為模式、體認到唯一不變的就是一切都在變，
對於別人做得到我們卻做不到的事總是忿忿不平，
同時有很多的夣想，更具備實踐的方法與勇氣。

請給我們一個互相瞭解的機會，主動聯絡我們或是回應我們的邀請。
讓我們一起成長，並且帶領台灣的軟體業突破重圍。

工作技能

1) 熟悉Linux系統的操作與架設，並瞭解 shell script。
2) 具 Linux 及 Open Source 開發經驗為佳。
3) 熟悉 OpenStack, Linux KVM , software-defined network, Ceph 等技術。
4) 瞭解 NoSQL 相關技術。具 MongoDB, Cassandra 開發經驗尤佳。
5) 瞭解 C/C++、Java、Python、Ruby 等程式語言。具 Qt 開發經驗尤佳。
6) 瞭解 PHP、JavaScript 等網頁程式語言。具 Pimple, Symfony, Doctrine, jQuery 開       發經驗尤佳。
7) 瞭解 Puppet 工具。

job_lists.title: IoT Wireless Embedded Software Engineer
job_lists.company: 馬來西亞商春迅股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
ADT (Advanced Development Team) 招募熟悉 BLE/WiFi 或其他無線技術 (e.g., Zigbee, Thread) 的軟體人才加入，如果您對 IoT (Internet of Things) 有熱情，有能力或有強烈意願學習將 IoT 相關技術應用在消費性電子產品或專業感應器和照明產業，為客戶創造新的價值，歡迎您來聊聊。

工作條件：
1. 熟悉 Bluetooth 4.0+ (Bluetooth Low Energy)，瞭解 Protocol 架構，知道 L2CAP, ATT, SM, GAP, GATT 及其應用。有一年以上的 BLE 相關 programming 經驗為佳。
2. 有 8-bit/16-bit/8051/ARM based MCU programming and debug 經驗。
3. 有 ADC, GPIO, I2C, SPI, Timer, Flash R/W 等周邊控制相關經驗任兩種。
4. 熟悉至少一種高階語言 (e.g., C語言)。
5. 有能力閱讀硬體 datasheet ，並分析和制定所需的軟硬體溝通介面。
6. 需與 EE 和 RF 工程師溝通，完成專案需求。
7. 對通訊技術和程式設計有熱情，會主動學習，能快速吸收新知，有能力將零散的資訊整理成有用的知識。
8. 樂於分享。
9. 對品質有堅持。
10. (Optional) 有 RTOS 或 Linux 系統程式設計經驗
11. (Optional) 有 PIR Sensor, Lighting Control 相關開發設計經驗
12. (Optional) 有 DALI, KNX 或其他 bus system 相關開發設計經驗
13. (Optional) 有 802.11 WiFi 相關開發設計經驗
job_lists.other_condition: 如有相關證照，Hackathon 競賽參賽或得獎經驗，請與履歷一併附上參考。

job_lists.title: 【CD00-06151】車用軟體開發工程師

job_lists.content:
We are looking for a full time Software Engineer who is interested in the embedded software to create and produce automotive product at Askey Computer Corp. In this role, you will be responsible for developing Android-based system software for Automotive solution. The system software may include firmware in IC, Linux kernel, device driver, hardware abstract layer, Android framework, and sometimes application for test/debug purpose. You will work closely with chip vendors and hardware (EE) engineers to build stable, high performance, and reliable platforms for the automotive product development. The ability of effective bug analysis, issue tracking, problem solving, and communication skills are highly demanded in this position. In our team, we will expect you to have a more perspective view to the entire software system and develop software modules to fulfill the requirements of product functionalities. 

Other essential functions include
 Reviews product requirement and software architecture
 Participates in the design and review of software specification
 Works with chip vendors and hardware engineers to build functionalities in BSP
 Performs root cause analysis and outlines corrective action for given problems
 Provides reliable solutions to a variety of problems
 Collaborates and adds value through providing comments in participation of peer code reviews
job_lists.other_condition:
 Solid foundation in software engineering
 Experience developing Linux kernel and device driver
 Experience developing Android-based embedded system
 Experience developing embedded system on Qualcomm Soc is preferable
 Experience in industrial interface standards such as UART, RS232, RS485, CAN, LIN, USB, I2C, I2S, MIPI SLIMBus, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, …etc

job_lists.company: 台灣達比斯移動通訊有限公司
job_lists.content:
We're looking for a program and project manager with proven experience in SDLC or mobile device development to join our fast growing company. In this role you will lead projects to deliver software products that will operate devices of various form factors. You will also get to work with some of the world's leading players to deliver products to the market.

Key Responsibilities

- Manage projects through the entire Software Delivery Life Cycle (SDLC) using standard project processes and tools
- Create project plan and track to key milestone dates associated with targeted implementation window
- Manage project communications & status reporting
- Work hands-on with internal and customer engineering teams to develop, mitigate and debug issues
- Attend internal, external and customer meetings which may involve online conference or require international travel

Requirements

- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- Solid technical background with understanding and/or hands-on experience in software development with mobile carriers or OEMs
- Knowledge of project management methods including agile and scrum
- Ability to resolve conflict and facilitate decision-making
- Flexible, process-oriented, organized, with excellent analytical & troubleshooting skills
- Experiences on web technologies preferred

job_lists.title: Metro/RDA Engineer
job_lists.company: 台灣美光記憶體股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description

As a Metrology/RDA Engineer in MTB, you have the opportunity to work with a cross functional team from different areas of the plant. You will meet regularly with the process areas to understand their tools and processes so as to create measurement recipes that can provide quick and accurate feedback on the product integrity, thus ensuring quality output. As technology advances, you will be constantly challenged with the need to innovate for newer, faster and better modes of monitoring. Besides working with the process areas, you will also liaise with vendors to explore best known methods to maintain high tool performance and embark on possible ways of cost reduction to ensure our product retains its competitiveness in the market. Additionally, you will be working in a clean/non-clean room environment.

Responsibilities and Tasks
Enable production Metro/RDA needs.
Provide first level of support for engineering requests, recipe maintenance, tool recovery and basic troubleshooting of tool issues
Collaborate with Manufacturing, Equipment and Process Engineering teams to set daily priorities and enable efficient communication.
Provide support and liaise with tool owners and vendors for long term down equipment, tool installation, relocation and upgrades, Preventive Maintenance (PM) and/or Corrective Maintenance (CM) schedule on tools
Ensure all Special Work Requests (SWRs) are processed correctly and in a timely manner
Collaborate with Production, Equipment and Process Engineering teams to optimize tool maintenance schedules and utilization
Partner with Process, Equipment Engineering and capacity teams to determinie sampling strategy to meet Production, Process Control and Quality requirement
Monitor and ensure all Metro/RDA tool meet measurement and inspection standards.
Set up tool qualification criteria, implement, monitoring through Statistical Process Control (SPC).
Make decisions on how to address tools and products that are out of control for established SPC rules for both process and defect related issues
Develop and manage projects designed to reduce cost, reduce tool measurement variability, improve availability, and find solutions to ongoing problems
Partner with Process, Equipment Owners and vendors for equipment upgrades/enhancements to improve tool performance
Perform periodic assessment, tool-to-tool matching and GR and R, etc. to ensure tool measurement accuracy.
Evaluation and enable next generation tool to close metrology gaps.
Partner with the metrology/inspection tool vendors to develop new hardware, software, and technologies.
Work with Manufacturing, Process and Equipment team on tool/product requirements.
Perform tool evaluation and buy-off
Seek and drive methodology breakthrough to improve efficiency in metro/rda function.
Drive process improvement through new recipe creation that helps to provide accurate and faster feedback to the line, thereby improving the confidence level of the product.
Participate in world-wide discussions for continuous improvement on the toolset(s) assigned across Micron sites.
Set up processes, design and implement process monitoring, control methodologies.
Establish business process standards, specifications and documents.
Continuously Improve the Reaction Mechanisms and Procedures based on feedback from the end users.
Work with peer groups to test and vet new Reaction Mechanisms and Procedures
Write and publish reports that summarize projects, detection capability improvements, manufacturing productivity and cost reduction work.
Mentor, coach and train
Provide active leadership to drive group to higher levels of proficiency
Mentor peers or junior team members.
Provide training and guidance.

Education
Required
Bachelors Degree or equivalent experience

Desired
Bachelors Degree
Engineering
Related field of study
job_lists.other_condition:
Experience
Required
More than 2 years experience in any of the following:
Metrology/RDA in semiconductor industry

Qualifications
Knowledge of semiconductor Metrology/RDA equipment
Knowledge and understanding of Statistical Process Control (SPC), process control and its reaction mechanism
Strong problem solving and critical thinking skills to troubleshoot problems and identify root causes
Ability to facilitate meetings and achieve cross area engagement
Good documentation skills with strong attention to details
Proven strong analytical and data summary skills
Ability to motivate a group of people toward a common goal.
Ability to work and lead cross-functional team project.
Experience in MSA (Measurement System Analysis) is an added advantage

job_lists.title: Software Test Engineer
job_lists.company: 網件有限公司
job_lists.content:
Summary Description:
NETGEAR's Arlo Home Monitoring group is seeking a highly motivate and detail oriented senior embedded software test engineer to join the Arlo QA team. The right candidate for this position is passionate about delivering the best possible experience for our users. Your responsibilities will include developing comprehensive tests to validate wireless camera, sensor and router embedded software/firmware. We seek a candidate who can hit the ground running. Ideally, this candidate is someone who has prior test experience on home automation solutions and/or home video monitoring systems.

• Bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering, computer engineering or similar technical field required. 
• 5+ years embedded software/firmware test experience. 
• Solid understanding of embedded Linux architecture.
• Strong scripting skills using Java, Python, and/or shell.
• Experience in performance testing and in-depth analysis of the system. 
• Experience testing embedded software for wireless network devices, home monitoring sensors, camera, etc.
• Proven ability to ramp up quickly on new technologies.
• Highly motivated and organized, with the ability to accept ambiguity and deliver exceptional results on tight schedules.
• Collaborative skills with exceptional verbal and written communication.
• Demonstrated creative, critical thinking and troubleshooting skills.

job_lists.title: Software Project Engineer
job_lists.company: 網件有限公司
job_lists.content:
As a member of the Netgear Engineering team, you will be responsible for managing the development of Networking Applications for Routers, Home Gateway, Wi-Fi extenders products.  These products will incorporate most of the following technologies:   DNS/DHCP, IP, HTTP, SNMP, 802.11n/ac/ad Wireless, Ethernet, VPN, Firewalls.  

The primary function of a Software Project Engineer at NETGEAR is project management and technical oversight.  The product development engineer manages the 3rd party application development vendors and ODMs to ensure that mobile applications are delivered in a timely fashion to a high quality and in accordance with the NETGEAR procedures and systems.  Software project engineer works with PLM to define the software project requirement and is responsible for developing functional specification of the Software project.

Job Responsibilities

• For assigned projects, take overall responsibility for delivering the applications ( iOS, Android, desktop); including requirements generation,  firmware, functional specification, and documentation,   Agile release requirements, per Netgear policies.  It is expected that projects should be managed with minimal supervision.  
• Project management.  Develop, publish and meet schedules, keep all stakeholders informed of product status at all times
• Project Execution.  Manage the suppliers' (ODM, application developers, etc.) SW development process. 
• Product Verification.  Manage verification testing of product features and performance and able to test field issues as needed.  
• Manage beta testing of the applications.  Follow Netgear beta process and resolved issues reported by beta users.
• Documentation. Provide input for manuals, help files, gift boxes, application notes and tech support web pages.
• Support. Resolve any 3rd level technical support escalations.  
• Travel as necessary to work with ODM/3rd party vendor 
• Track industry technology developments, supplier roadmaps, standards bodies and make product recommendations

Skills and Requirements

• BSEE/MSEE with 5-10 years experience in networking software product development
• Hands on mobile SW development is a plus
• Strong understanding of home and WiFi networking.
• Engineering background with significant hands-on experience in product development.
• Strong problem solving skills, able to track and resolve issues.
• Effective organization, project management and coordination skills; ability to get the job done.
• Ability and willingness to take ownership of SW applications; get the job done with minimal supervision.
• Teamwork.  This position requires a close working relationship with the extended Netgear team, including engineering, beta team, customer support, marketing and program management.  
• Good communication skills, both written and verbal.
• Experience working in a start-up environment.
• Self-starter that works well on a team.
• Adaptive to ever-changing situations and answer the challenges

job_lists.title: V2X (Vehicle-to-Everything) Application Engineer (車間通訊應用軟體工程師)
job_lists.company: 亞勳科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description (職務說明)：
works with the global team to develop and demonstrate V2X (Vehicle-to-Everything) concepts. Defines the V2X application software requirements on company’s platform, OS environment and development tools. 

Core Responsibility (負責工作): 
communicates with hardware platform engineer, IEEE 1609.x/ ETSI TC-ITS protocol engineer, and works with an engineering counterpart to define and develop V2X (Car2X, C-ITS) application software.
 
Details of Job Functions (詳細工作內容):
- Works with Systems Engineering to specify hardware platform requirements         and needed vehicle interfaces
- Works with customers to understand OEM software architecture direction, and influence direction as appropriate
- Participates in definition of V2X features including estimation of complexity and resource requirements
- Participates in developing V2X demonstration features and properties

Reporting (報告):
- Reports directly to the V2X Application Software Manager
job_lists.other_condition:
Requirements (資歷需求):
-Bachelor degree in Engineering or technical discipline required. Advanced technical degree preferred.
- 1 year experience developing and debugging automotive software in a real-time, embedded, multiprocessor, multi-interface environment preferred.
- Working knowledge of V2X Protocol Stack: ETSI ITS/G5, IEEE 1609.x, IEEE 802.11p, SAE J2735, IEEE 1609.11 preferred.
- Good internal/external communication skills

job_lists.company: 亞勳科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description (職務說明)：
provides integration support for company’s Wi-Fi RF modules and Wi-Fi Access Point Platform. The position is both technical and customer oriented to ensure design wins with company’s products. Will work with global teams, internal and external, to drive projects to completion. Working with minimal supervision and self-learning is expected.

Core Responsibility (負責工作): 
provides integration support and technical assistance for company’s products to FAE, FSE, and high-value customers. Actively works with customers on design activities and resolving issues. Coordinates new firmware releases from engineering to production.  

Details of Job Functions (詳細工作內容):
- Ability to work in cross-functional, and global, teams in a highly collaborative manner.
- Strong in embedded programming and firmware design.
- Familiar with Linux Open Source and C/C++ programming language.
- Working with minimal supervision and self-learning, actively works with customers on design activities and resolving issues to drive projects to completion. 
- Good written and verbal communication skills

job_lists.other_condition:

- Practical working knowledge of WiFi 802.11 technology preferred.
- Ability to troubleshoot and debug systems, circuits, and devices preferred.
- Good internal/external communication skills

- Familiar with open source projects such as OpenWRT or DD-WRT, MADWiFi / ath9k/ath10k/ath3k, Hostapd and mac802.11 is a plus
- Familiar with RF test is a plus.
- In-depth knowledge on TCP/IP and related network protocols is a plus.

job_lists.title: 軟體工程師
job_lists.company: 台灣科以比股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
通訊軟體工程師
1.與系統分析師、工程師、程式設計師等商討，設計系統，並獲得關於專案的限制、容量、性能需求和介面等的訊息。
2.修正現有軟體的錯誤，使其適應新硬體或改進其性能。
3.分析客戶需要和軟體需求，考量時間及成本的限制條件，以評估計畫的可行性。
4.與客戶商討軟體系統的設計和維修。
5.確保軟體系統的安裝能與監視器功能配合，以符合設計規格。 

軟體設計工程師
1.新產品軟體開發與維護
2.機電整合與人機介面設計
3.電腦數值控制器軟體功能程式撰寫
4.客製產品技術需求應用分析與評估
5.負責軟體之分析、設計以及程式撰寫。
6.規劃執行軟體架構及模組之設計，並控管軟體設計進度。
7.進行軟體之測試與修改。
8.規劃、執行與維護量產的產品。
9.協助研發軟體新技術與新工具。 

電腦系統分析師
1.負責電腦資訊之傳輸，以及電腦軟體、資料庫、資料結構之維修與研發。
2.設計、撰寫、維修及更新軟體，以控制硬體與電腦應用軟體之連接。
3.維護資料庫管理系統，確保資料的安全性。

job_lists.title: 資深JavaScript工程師
job_lists.company: 美商迪諾亞股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
本職缺主要為Web應用開發工作，主要為企業用訊息溝通及管理之相關工具。This opening is looking for experienced web application engineers, who will be implementing our innovative messaging systems and UX for enterprise. Potential talents with the following skill sets are highly welcome. 

美商迪諾亞D2 Nova為美商迪爾亞D2 Tech 轉投資的公司，承襲母公司專業的IP通訊技術，D2 Nova以發展網路服務SaaS、E-Commerce 為目標，並基於原母公司的電信技術IMS、VoLTE、RCS，結合OTT與Web雲端科技，將服務實現在公有雲(Public Cloud, AWS)之上，提供優質的互聯網通訊服務。D2 Nova總部設於美國加州聖塔芭芭拉。 
D2 Nova is the creator of the VX communications platform, GlobalConnect voice and the professional messaging service for teams, TeamASAP. D2 is an established leader of IP communications solutions. Our headquarters is based in California, US, with branch offices in Taipei, Hsinchu, and Beijing. 

應徵資格 Qualifications: 
1. Understand fundamentals like HTML, JavaScript, and CSS
2. CSS preprocessors like Sass and LESS
3. JavaScript frameworks like Ember, AngularJS, ReactJS, etc., or JS-based build tools like Grunt, Gulp, and Bower
3. Skills in one or more chosen frameworks/libraries like jQuery, AngularJS, or Bootstrap
4. Back-end technologies like Node.js, Express.js, and Horizon
5. Optional skills 熟悉或者略知以下選項尤佳(非必要)
(a) web applications: 在android/iOS/Windows/MacOS 上的web application/library開發經驗.(e.g: Electron, Ionic, React Native)

Target application: https://www.team.biz/zh.html 
Location 工作地點: Taipei Neihu 台北 內科

job_lists.title: Team.Biz 企業訊息溝通管理系統 -資深前端工程師
job_lists.company: 美商迪諾亞股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
開發Team.Biz企業訊息溝通管理系統，這套系統是為了讓企業及專業人士能夠整合所有聯絡訊息/管道/多媒體(messages, files, email, SMS, audio call/conference, video call/conference)的一個軟體智能管理服務平台。

企業之間的工作往來、會議溝通、文件訊息、電話、簡訊、多媒體，全部都將在Team.Biz上發送、接收、以及智能地管理。

作為這套系統的前端工程師，將會負責及參與團隊設計軟體模塊(module)及通訊協定(RESTful, web socket)，實現優秀的使用者體驗(UX)，以及有效率的單元自動化測試，並且擴展軟體開發經驗及技術到各種不同的前端裝置平台或作業系統(android, iOS, Windows, MacOS, Linux,….)，與團隊共同成長。

美商迪諾亞D2 Nova為美商迪爾亞D2 Tech 轉投資的公司，承襲母公司專業的IP通訊技術，D2 Nova以發展網路服務SaaS、E-Commerce 為目標，並基於原母公司的電信技術IMS、VoLTE、RCS，結合OTT與Web雲端科技，將服務實現在公有雲(Public Cloud, AWS)之上，提供優質的互聯網通訊服務。D2 Nova總部設於美國加州聖塔芭芭拉。 
D2 Nova is the creator of the VX communications platform, GlobalConnect voice and the professional messaging service for teams, Team.Biz. D2 is an established leader of IP communications solutions. Our headquarters is based in California, US, with branch offices in Taipei, Hsinchu, and Beijing. 

應徵資格 Qualifications: 
 1. Familiar with web fundamentals like HTML, JavaScript, CSS, DOM, HTTP, Web socket. 
2. Experienced with AngularJS or Angular or React or React Native 
3. It's a plus to know 
   (a). any other JS framework(Angular 2/4, React, Redux)
   (b).bundling tools(Webpack, Closure, SystemJS, CommonJS) 
   (c).CSS preprocessor (Sass, Less, Stylus)
   (d).Javascript transpiler(Babel, Shift-JS, JSweet)
   (e).Web animations, material designs.
4. Optional skills 熟悉或者略知以下選項尤佳(非必要) 
    (a) mobile applications: 在 android/iOS 上的application/library開發經驗.(e.g: Ionic, React Native, Nativescript, android JAVA, Swift) 
   (b) desktop applications: 在 Windows/MacOS 上開發經驗.(e.g: Electron, Swift, C#)

Target application: https://www.team.biz/zh.html 
Location 工作地點: Taipei Neihu 台北 內科

job_lists.title: Software Engineer 軟體工程師
job_lists.company: 行競科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
行競科技正在召募軟體工程師來進行電動車及產品研發計劃。首要條件就是您必須對於高性能載具及電動載具充滿熱情。 

行競科技位於台北，是一間有著遠大目標的新創公司。我們專注於整車(路車)的設計和組裝。另外，我們也提供工程顧問和產品研發的服務給電動載具及相關產品。 

職務要求: 
1. 負責開發Web-base的應用程式，使用者友善的GUI和快速開發原型。 
2. 對於Ajax, Web Services, SOAP, REST, JQuery and JSON有基礎的知識。 
3. 至少熟悉一種主流的工具 (C#, JAVA)。 
4. 有 Google Polymer 或其他跨平台語言經驗尤佳。 
5. 勇於挑戰對於不同的領域和學習新技能 
6. 整合軟硬體的能力 

Xing Mobility is looking for Software Engineers to support a new vehicle program. You must be passionate about high-performance cars and electric vehicles! 

Xing Mobility is a small company with big plans. We are designing and building complete vehicles (road legal) here in Taipei. In addition, we provide engineering consulting services and product development for electric vehicle products. 

1. Responsible for developing web-based applications, User-friendly GUI, and develop prototypes quickly. 
2. Basic knowledge of Ajax, Web Services, SOAP, REST, JQuery and JSON. 
3. Good scripting skills in at least one common language (C#, JAVA). 
4. Google Polymer and other open source technologies is a plus. 
5. Excitement for learning new domains and new skills! 
6. Ability to integrate hardware and software.

job_lists.title: App開發工程師(iOS/Android).
job_lists.company: 永慶房產集團_永慶房屋仲介股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 永慶房產集團以科技房仲自許，用科技創新引領房仲變革。集團正推動資訊系統升級，歡迎IT領域的優秀夥伴加入!我們資訊團隊曾多次獲獎並擁有多項領導業界的應用產品以及創新的技術開發環境，鼓勵團隊成員持續學習、提升技能。夥伴們年輕、充滿活力，在活潑歡樂的工作氛圍下，彼此分享經驗一起成長。我們提供高發展性的環境及完整的升遷制度，讓您盡情發揮專長!!我們的工作內容 :1. App 應用程式設計開發(iOS、Android)2. 進行軟體測試與維護、優化軟體效能3. 協助研發軟體新技術。如您具有APP相關開發經驗，本公司提供高挑戰性、創新的技術環境，優渥的薪資福利，誠摯歡迎您加入我們的創新團隊。加入我們，您可享有：-免費企業按摩師服務，生活好放鬆-部門聚餐津貼，吃吃喝喝感情更好-員工旅遊，行萬里路增見聞-生日津貼、三節禮金／禮券，足甘心-專屬員工免費Coffee 喝到飽-不定期免費包場電影，生活好愜意-團購、下午茶，調劑身心真抒壓-內部教育訓練，共享成長-升遷制度透明又完整-工作免制服，天天都是便服日-注重生活與工作的平衡，聰明工作、健康生活-各領域書籍讀物區、交通方便的地點
job_lists.other_condition: 1. 大專以上，科系不拘2. 具iOS或Android app一年以上開發經驗3. 熟悉Objective C / Swift 或 Android SDK / Java4. 熟悉Xcode / Android Studio開發工具5. 具整合3rd Party Library 或 API 經驗者尤佳6. App (iOS/ Android)上架作品優先錄取7. 面試時請帶可Demo的個人作品

job_lists.title: R0003_Android Engineer
job_lists.company: TutorABC_麥奇數位股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 本公司為致力於開發eLearning全面解決方案/行動裝置平台的e-company，曾獲無數獎項，現徵求Android軟體工程師人材以協助本公司的 eLearning平台更具擴展性，並且運用網頁/行動裝置技術開發新產品。如果您正在找尋機會成為創新環境中快速成長之科技公司的一份子，本公司正是您 所尋找的，而且我們會給你最佳的在職訓練！您將會與開發團隊、產品經理及營運團隊密切工作，以確保研發成果的快速、高可靠性及品質。此職務將參與5-20人的專案開發，並在完整的開發流程下，體驗專業分工且各單位緊密配合的絕佳效率。歡迎對於開發創新有熱血的人，對於雲端服務有夢想的人，對於開發「酷」軟體有堅持的人，對於創造品質優良軟體頑固的人加入我們，茁壯雲端平台技術和品質，感受全球化規模的震撼，突破自己的眼界，成為G11N系統一份子。[Job Responsibilities]對Android在Phone/Pad 開發有高度熱誠，喜歡研究各種類型的App。對使用者體驗的重視，想做出讓人愛不釋手的App?我們在挑戰，我們也在創新!希望有此企圖心的你，一起加入我們的團隊，並讓台灣的線上教育更上一層樓。目前已經有了一個讓大家一起發揮的舞台，一起來迎接不一樣的未來吧![Job Requirements]若你責任心強樂愛學習新東西同時具備團隊合作和獨立作業的特質擁有三年以上的開發經驗並熟悉Android SDK, Android Studio, Eclipse IDE擁有OOP與UML技能尤佳面試請攜帶作品 請你帶著作品集與我們見面，你!肯定是我們要找的人才歡迎加入我們的瘋狂舞台揮灑更多資訊，請參考TutorABC菁英招募網站http://www.tutorabc.com/aspx/HR/

job_lists.title: Java Software Engineer(BPM System)
job_lists.company: 伈創資訊股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
這個職位徵求的是 J2EE/J2SE 的開發工程師，專注於 Java BPM System 的開發。

BPM(Business Process Management)流程管理系統，是一種整合了電子表單、流程管理及訊息管理三個模組的企業流程管理系統，能有效幫助企業優化和管理相關業務流程，提升工作效率，降低運營成本；常見的應用範例包括請假、請(採)購、人事薪資、出差、費用申請、請款等等。

如果 Java 是你天生倒背如流的語言，我們歡迎你一同加入伈創的技術團隊，打造最佳的智慧簽核系統平台，提供顧客最優質的企業內流程協作體驗。 

身為一個 BPM 的 Java 工程師，您需要熟悉以下工作內容：
- 設計、實作 Java Web 程式並有能力做前置測試
- 開發、設計一個能有效率處理資料的系統，並且能被其他工程師維護
- 撰寫 Java Backend API/Service，並與 JavaScript 前端工程師以及流程引擎的後端工程師做整合性的開發
- 有能力在技術團隊中，與夥伴控同關切彼此的開發進度，協力制定開發流程並能做好 Peer Review Programming
job_lists.other_condition:
- 熟悉 Java 程式語言，若有相關證照 (SCJP, SCWCD 等...) 佳。
- 有 Struts, Spring, JTA 或 Hibernate 等相關 Java framework 使用開發經驗
- 了解前端技術者佳
- 熟悉 jBPM 流程開發工具者佳

job_lists.title: Product Development Antenna Engineer
job_lists.company: 百慕達商泰科資訊科技有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
This position will be located at our antenna laboratory in Taipei, Taiwan and will report to the lab Manager.  The primary function of this position is to provide support for new product design.
•Project Management and RF support for Global Consumer Antenna projects at the engineering and manufacturing plant level.
•Design, development, and testing of antennas for wearables, tablets, notebooks, smartphones and other home devices
•Troubleshoot RF/design issues during production startup at manufacturing plants in China. 
•Support Global TE Antenna design Centers as needed in Asia and Europe.

Responsibilities & Qualifications
•Understanding of antenna manufacturing technologies including Stamping, FPCB, LDS, and MID
•Experience using standard RF testing equipment such as VNA and Antenna test chamber/fixture setups.
•Experience in active OTA and SAR measurements.
•Experience using antenna simulation software, such as CST or HFSS.
•Experience bringing new antenna products to production in a manufacturing plant atmosphere.
job_lists.other_condition:
•Excellent oral and written communication skills demonstrated by the ability to communicate across all levels within and outside of the organization.  Proven ability to turn lab test data into professional reports.
•Flexible in working hours and travel.
•Strong project management and organizational skills.
•Self-starter, willingness to make difficult decisions and do “whatever it takes” to satisfy the customer.
•Msc/BS in Electrical/RF Engineering required.
•Experience designing consumer antennas

job_lists.title: Foundry Support Engineer
job_lists.company: 安矽思科技股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
JOB SUMMARY
The Foundry Support Engineer will be mainly responsible for ANSYS technology enablement, product development, and information exchanges between ANSYS and foundry partners. This role will be expected to work closely with other foundry members and R&D team to provide application and technology support for foundry partners and ANSYS customers.

ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS

• Support foundry engagement with ANSYS solution, including ANSYS solution certification, reference flow, and mutual customer support
• Working on comprehensive QA to ensure high-quality delivery of ANSYS solution to meet foundry and mutual customer requirement
• Run expert-level debug, effectively solve or narrow down the issue
• Review foundry spec with RD, and track foundries issues
• Work with FAE team to support customer usage of foundry technology collaterals

JOB MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS AND QUALIFICATIONS
• BS degree, prefer PhD or MS, in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or related field, with minimum three year experience
• Basic understanding of power analysis, ASIC design flow, VLSI, RC extraction, and/or CAD engineering, knowledge and experience with ANSYS tools is a plus, but is not required.
• Demonstrated ability to work effectively with colleagues in technical functions to achieve common goals
• Good verbal and written communication skills


OTHER INFORMATION
• Prior experience with foundry support preferred
• Expertise in scripting languages like perl, TCL desired
• Self-motivated individual with deep sense of ownership and accountability

ABOUT ANSYS, INC.

If you’ve ever seen a rocket launch, flown on an airplane, driven a car, used a computer, touched a mobile device, crossed a bridge, or put on wearable technology, chances are you’ve used a product where ANSYS software played a critical role in its creation. ANSYS is the global leader in engineering simulation. We help the world’s most innovative companies deliver radically better products to their customers. By offering the best and broadest portfolio of engineering simulation software, we help them solve the most complex design challenges and engineer products limited only by imagination. Join our nearly 3000 professionals in more than 75 strategic locations around the world in making a difference in the world of engineering simulation and product development. Visit www.ansys.com for more information.

ANSYS INSPIRE VALUES
INNOVATION
STRIVE FOR EXCELLENCE
PASSION & INTENSITY
INTEGRITY
RESPECT & TRUST

job_lists.title: Sr. Software Application Engineer
job_lists.company: 澳洲商寬騰達通訊股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Job Description and Responsibilities
• Work directly with customers to resolve/reproduce technical issues.
• Establish and maintain lines of communication with engineering and customer to discuss technical issues.
• Debug software issues such as bootloader, linux kernel and WLAN driver
• Evaluate Wi-Fi throughput, range and performance 
• Work with issues in Wi-Fi, IOT, Wi-Fi-Certification and Manufacturing.
• Customize software and drivers for customer’s platform.
• Software/driver integration for open source framework/platform ( Andriod/openWRT/RDK-B..)  
• Tools development to shorten customer support circle.
• Write technical application notes. Host technical training for internal FAE and external customers.
• Oversea travel is required to work with internal team or customers.

Skills & Qualifications
• Candidate should have 5-10 years of experience in software designing and supporting networking and wireless drivers
• Strong knowledge of Wi-Fi protocols and throughput analysis using tools – sniffers, spectrum analyzers,Chariot, iperf etc.
• Candidate should have solid experience in networking – L2 bridging, L3 routing, TCP/IP, UDP, IGMP, DHCP, NAT, VLAN.
• Candidate should have solid experience in analysing WIFI protocols - 802.11ac, WPS, WPA/WPA2 security, RADIUS, MESH.
• Candidate should have solid experience supporting u-boot/linux on embedded processor platforms.
• Strong problem solving skills. Strong customer facing experience 
• Strong written and oral communication skills. Good interpersonal skills.
• Video over Wi-Fi experience is preferable
• Reference Design Kit for Broadband devices (RDK-B) experience is preferable
• wireless mesh network (WMN) experience is preferable

Education and Experience
• Bachelor degree in EE or CS required. Masters preferred.
• At least 10 years of experience with at least 3-5 years in customer facing roles.

Candidate please send the English CV(resume) for job applying.

job_lists.title: Mechanical Sr. Principal Engineer
job_lists.company: 荷蘭商臺灣戴爾股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_lists.content:
Dell is looking for engineers in the field of Mechanical Engineering and/or Thermal Engineering to work on architecting and developing the next generation of personal computing devices and the eco-system around them. In this role, you will be responsible for working closely with other technologists, architects, experience designers, industrial designers, product marketers, and software developers and will learn more about the architecture and definition of computing devices and solutions. Basic understanding of operating systems and software is desired. 
Role Responsibility: 
• Work with internal Dell technology, marketing and engineering teams to develop the architectures and detailed definition of products. 
• Work with internal Dell teams on early development of new concepts and form factors focusing in the areas of mechanicals, thermals, mechanisms, materials and manufacturing technology. 
• Assist in exploring, incubating and developing new technologies and concepts. 
• Role will require product instrumentation, lab testing, error analysis, and data reduction. 
• Role will require the use of ProE for CAD. 
• Role will require basic understanding of analysis methodologies used in the design of mechanical components, mechanisms and structures. 
• Role will require basic understanding and analysis of thermal principals (conduction, convection, and radiation). 
• Basic CFD analysis as required to achieve project goals. 
• Will be required to present all analysis and critical findings in concise presentations to team members and management. 
• Keep management informed of key technical and schedule related risks and issues. 
• Perform detailed or routine engineering assignments such as assisting with the definition of technical specifications, basic design problem resolution, providing product support and assistance to other internal departments. 
• All other duties as assigned.
job_lists.other_condition:
Requirements: 
• MS in Mechanical Engineering. 
• Ability to handle responsibilities with effective interpersonal skills. Ability to interface with others inside and outside the Engineering function is required. 
• System level understanding of computing technologies. 
• Knowledge in engineering materials, mass production manufacturing processes and capabilities, tolerance analysis, CFD (Flotherm/IcePak), numerical and computational skills, CAD and FEA a plus. 
• Must have strong communication/presentation skills and some background in basic engineering design. 
• Ability to organize and manage multiple projects, setting priorities and working independently under aggressive timelines.

job_lists.title: DPDK Engineer
job_lists.company: 泰錸科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Timeline Technologies is looking for engineers who have developed high performance solutions in DPDK ( Data Plane Development Kit ) to join our technology team.  As a key member of the technology team, you will work closely with others developers, researchers, and traders.  Our developers are focused on improving and expanding the capabilities of our low-latency trading system which includes: 

•Trade Engine and Backtesting 
•Exchange Connectivity and Infrastructure 
•Strategy Monitoring and Reporting Tools 
•Compliance and Risk Verification 

Timeline Technologies was founded in 2016 as an quantitative research and technology firm.  We are active in several markets in Asia and are excited to add more technical expertise to our team.  The work will be challenging, fast-paced, and competitive.  Timeline Technologies is a flat organization, where ideas flow freely throughout the firm.  A financial background is not necessary, rather we are looking for self-motivated engineers that have applied new technologies to solving challenging problems.  

What we're looking for

•Experience with DPDK environment to implement low-latency network solutions   
•Deep familiarity with Linux kernel and network protocols L2/L3/L4 - Ethernet/IP/TCP/UDP
•Strong C programming skills

job_lists.title: Linux /Network Engineer
job_lists.company: 泰錸科技有限公司
job_lists.content:
Timeline Technologies was founded in 2016 as an quantitative research and technology firm.  We are active in several markets in Asia and looking for experienced Linux/Network Engineer to join our technology team.  At Timeline Technologies, our engineers design, build, and improve our core trading system.  As a key member of the technology team, you will collaborate closely with other developers, researchers, and traders.

Our system engineers are focused on improving the performance of our trading system.  Key responsibilities include: 

•Linux kernel tuning to minimize trading system latency  
•Tune network infrastructure to minimize trading system latency 
•Automate processes to monitor system-wide latency and other key performance metrics
•Investigate new products and techniques to improve efficiency and performance 

The work will be challenging, fast-paced, and competitive.  Timeline Technologies is a flat organization, where ideas flow freely throughout the firm.  You will have the opportunity to work with smart people in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.  A financial background is not necessary, rather we are looking for self-motivated engineers that have applied new technologies to solving challenging problems.  This role is based in Taipei, Taiwan.  

What we're looking for

•Deep understanding of the Linux Kernel and Operating System. Capable of rebuilding the kernel.
•Expert knowledge of networking protocols (Ethernet/IP/TCP/UDP)
•Experience tuning Linux kernel (hardware performance policy, process affinity, numa, tuna and schedulers)
•Experience implementing automated hardware and software system performance metrics 
•Strong scripting skills

Based on the same platform, LINE developers also create many other popular services. Under LINE Taiwan engineering organization, developer and QA engineer work closely to meet the same goal. Developer is in charge application development and QA engineer is to design and execute test cases, ensuring that they meet the needs of customers and other stakeholders related to a service.[Responsibilities]- Prepare documentation and test cases according to service specs- Identify quality issues and drive corrective actions to resolve them- Co-work with planners and developers to isolate issues by collecting detailed process steps, log files, and other data- Assist with design and execute manual test for new and existing services- Use tools to execute load test and stress test- Facilitate stakeholders to understand, learn, and follow the quality assurance process- Estimate and manage release schedule[Qualifications]- CS/MIS/EE or related BS graduate- Curious and eager to learn new technology- Responsible for the assigned tasks- Experience of software quality assurance model or methodology, familiar with quality metrics- Experiences in web or mobile testing- Experiences in agile development is a plus- Knows Japanese/Korean language is a plus- Familiar with Jira/Confluence is a plus- At least 5-year experiences in software QA

job_lists.title: Connected Car Cloud
job_lists.company: 群瑜股份有限公司
job_lists.content: 負責研發、架構本司Connected Car Project的Cloud。主要負責研發符合MISRA C / C++以及ISO 26262(Autmotive Functional Safety)標準規範的DDS(Data Distribution Service)聯網架構的Middleware使其可部屬於嵌入式系統如Android(使用NDK串接)或AGL(Automotive Grade Linux: TIZEN IVI)與基於現在的雲建置使用的OpenStack進行整合。相關資料請參考:http://opendds.org/https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MISRA_Chttp://portals.omg.org/dds/Apply此職務需要對現在Message Queue的Solution如MQTT / ZeroMQ與Syncthing等有基本的了解並熟OOP。

job_lists.title: ANDROID軟體研發工程師（Software Developer）
job_lists.company: 群瑜股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
此職務負責車用ANDROID IVI(In-Vehicle Infotainment)的Application與操作環境開發(MMI)。工作內容涉及到對Framework與Binder的理解。需要熟SurfaceView等即使處理圖形的Class。有Unity3D或Unreal開發經驗加。研發項目包括:
1. LBS 基於OpenStreetMap
主要為車用導航系統 使用OpenStreetMap / NDK 開發Application與SDK等工具
2.Audio Video Playback / Media Player
主要為車用收音機與TV Tuner的開發
3.Bluetooth MMI與Hands-Free Application
基於BlueZ或Bluedroid 有使用CSR Bluecore 5系列開發On Chip Flash Profiles經驗加
4.Human Machine Interface
修改或Customize原生操作環境及圖形介面 串接Framework與Service 或配置Stack Order
5.Car Head Unit Application開發（以目前車載MVP來看包括）
5-1. USB OTG Utility 主要用來診斷、下載Log以及更新軟韌體
5-2. TV Tuner Application
5-3. AM FM Tuner With RDS / DAB / DAB+ Features
5-4. Traffic / Real-Time
job_lists.other_condition:
本工作主要為上層Application以及上往下Framework相關工作。主要以開發以下產品為主：
1.　LBS（Location Based Service）
使用Google Map / Porting OpenStreetMap進行
路徑推薦
POI推薦
路徑推送
慣性導航
交通流量監控
具備相關功能Application開發

預計使用以下Data Structure、改寫相關Open Source Project與工具進行項目開發：
Microformat
SimpleGEO
GEOSMS
OpenLayer
GEORSS
GEOJASON
Flatbuffer

2. Automotive Multimedia Player
工作包含開發MP3 / MP4 / AVI常見串流影音功能
使用GSTREAM
以及OPENCL / OPENGL
OpenAVB
改寫aTune或Banshee相關開放原始碼專案
結合Android Auto SDK進行車用娛樂系統及Ethernet AVB的項目開發

3. 車用診斷系統
基於整車網路CAN / LIN / FLEXRAY等Serial Bus或Over IP進行汽車系統診斷Application項目開發。Ethernet作為下一代車內網路骨幹已由多家發起單位、報導體製造商與車廠積極推廣。預計會使用UDP取代傳統使用CAN的診斷模式。此職務需要開發俱有遠端或空中診斷功能的產品。本工作涉及通訊協定開發。
目前可以使用的Source計有：
GENIVI Middleware For Diagnostic Over Ethernet IP
OpenXC
SocketCAN
lwIP / uIP

job_lists.title: 嵌入系統研發工程師（Embedded System Developer Android Auto / FreeRTOS）
job_lists.company: 群瑜股份有限公司
job_lists.content:
本職務工作內容為車用電子產品：韌體、底層通訊、系統嵌入（Driver Porting、BSP）、核心改寫與User Space / Kernel Space Driver Modification、Bootloader Setup / Modification、HAL - JNI、RTOS開發以及移植。使用ARM M / Cortex A / PowerPC為主。主要以NXP（FREESCAL）I.MX6 / I.MX7 / S32 / PowerPC / Kinetis或TI Jacinto與Renesas R-Car等AP或MCU為主。本職務所開Embedded System根據產品可以分為：

* 韌體工作（FIRMWARE）
負責開發車身電子控制單元：
車身車體控制及微機電系統整合（Body Electronics）
主要工作內容：以8 / 16 / 32 BIT MCU韌體開發為主控制馬達電機、Sensor（包括Camera）類型的產品。分為被動安全：包括POWER SEAT CONTRO UNIT（座椅控制單元）、SUNROOF CONTROL UNIT（天窗控制單元）、WINDOW CONTROL UNIT（邊窗控制單元）、DOOR CONTROL UNIT（車門控制單元）、KEY CONTROL UNIT WITH RKE（SMART KEY）、WIPER CONTROL UNIT（雨刷控制單元）、DASHBOARD（車用儀表系統）與主動安全：動力電源管理系統（POWERTRAIN MANAGEMENT SYSTEM）、防盜系統（ANTI-THEFT SYSTEM）或輔助安全如：LANE DEPARTURE WARNING SYSTEM（道路偏移警示系統）等現代汽車主要常見的Applications。

* 通訊協定（PROTOCOL）
負責開發車內提供多個系統溝通的通訊設備、裝置與界面：V2V ROUTER（VEHICLE TO VEHICLE FOR INTER-VEHICLE COMMUNICATION）使用DEDICATED SHORT-RANGE COMMUNICATION METHOD為主如WI-FI AP、AUTOMOTIVE GSM / 3G / LTE ROUTER（FOR CONNECTED CAR）（車用網路路由器）、GATEWAY CONTROL UNIT（閘道控制器）中個電裝部件的BLUETOOTH PROFILE、WIFI PROTOCOL、CAN BUS、LIN BUS、K-LINE、MediaLB MOST、ETHERNET AVB開發。

目前包括硬體在內將技術研發目標總結為以下產品：
1. ECU（ELECTRIC CONTROL UNIT）
    包括主動安全、被動安全、輔助安全
2. GCU（GATEWAY CONTROL UNIT）
    系統內通訊
3. POWER MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
    電源監控、調節與管理
4. GSM / 3G / LTE ROUTER
    連網
5. IVI In-Vehicle Infotainment 車載資訊系統
6. ADAS包括Surround View以及其他Computer Vision Base Device
7. EVR（Event Data Record）
8. DLP BASE PROJECTIVE HUD WITH VR Functions

職務內容分為：
1. 底層分為：
    1-1 System Bring-Up
    包括Modify Bootloader以及Build Up Filesystem / Memory Handling / OTA
    1-2 Device Driver Modification / Development / Porting
    包括HAL相關工作 / Customize BSP
    Driver記有以下常見的Peripherals
    Bluetooth BLE / Classic包括Profile等工作
    WIF
    Ethernet AVB Using Twisted Pair BroadR-Reach
    Capacitive Touch Panel With Display Control Driver
    USB Host
    RS232
    RS485
    HDMI
    Audio Driver & Codec
    CAN BUS Driver
    LIN BUS Driver

2. Framework
    又分為：
    2-1 Networking / RIL主要工作包括開發Networking Middleware / Daemon / Voice 
          Service供上層使用
    2-2 Multimedia主要工作包括開發Media Framework / Service供上層使用

我們使用以下系統作為開發環境：    
Primary Development Environment：
Ubuntu / Window

Target System：
Android Auto
FreeRTOS / MQX

本工作會使用到以下開放原始碼計劃的相關工具：
Tools & Supported Projects In Adoption
1. OpemEmbedded
2. Yocto Project / Porky & Bitbake
3. GENIVI

在線除錯工具或Download Cable：
Debugger & Probe：
I-Jet
J-LINK
Cyclone Pro
Cyclone Pro Max
General Download Cable
DStream

經常使用的晶片計有：
Processors / MCU / FPGA CPLD / GPU In Adoption
Freescale Kinetis (ARM M0+)
Freescale I.MX 6 Above (ARM Cortex A9)
TI Jacinto (ARM Cortex A15)
Renesas R Car
Broadcom & CSR Bluetooth With WIFI
Broadcom & NXP BroadR-Reach Ethernet PHY
Intersil Video Processor With Display Control Feature & Scaler
Fortmedia Voice Processor（DSP）For Noise Cancellation
如果不直接使用MPU的Touch Interface時
多使用Atmel的Solution

以上職務需要俱備有良好的工作能力以及開發產品的熱情。歡迎在各領域有不同產品開發經驗的Developer加入。相關領域研究生無經驗亦可。
job_lists.skills: 系統架構規劃、系統維護操作、系統整合分析、韌體工程開發、網路資料傳輸、信號與系統設計、訊號壓縮技術、通訊工程技術開發、通訊技術發展研究、無線通訊技術開發、資料通訊與網路應用、數位通訊技術訊號處理、硬體整合測試、軟體程式設計、結構化程式設計、韌體程式設計、模組化系統設計、設計網路安全系統、撰寫硬體語言程式
job_lists.other_condition: 基於Android的底層工作主要為System Bring Up。工作為Bootloader到Driver Porting與Struct HAL以及Peripheral的Protocols。由於工作細節比較多。具體分工針對職能與技能會在面試時討論再斟酌分配。所列工作內容不代表要求一個人需要完全處理。我們提供的OFFER依然把FIRMWARE / PROTOCOL / SYSTEM BRING UP分開。其中通信協議的部分如Bluetooth / WIFI也會是專人專用。

job_lists.title: iOS/Android 軟體研發工程師

job_lists.content: 我們以深厚的技術實力、從專業的客製專案建置構架、與完整的行銷流程，來協助客戶創建各種類型電子商務系統、生產運營管理平台及行動裝置APP系統。具備資料分析與系統優化配置能力，具備軟硬體系統集成能力，協助客戶形成最佳系統配置。柯思科技在數位金融(Fintech)、電子商務(E-commerce)、物聯網(IOT)及大數據與人工智慧(BigData&AI)有深刻的技術及經驗。我們在台灣從專案開始，擅長於打造從0到1的新創事業，現在我們更關注於新創項目的國際複製及擴大。因我們對於品質的堅持並提供完善的服務，我們獲得許多合作廠商的肯定，目前已承接『工研院』『資策會』『各大銀行』等的中大型開發專案。【需求條件】1. 大學以上資訊相關科系 (資工、資管、資科等)2. 工作經驗不拘3. 勇於學習與獨立思考，樂於團隊溝通合作。【專業能力】1、有良好的使用者介面，用戶端應用程式的設計經驗，有上線產品經驗者優先。2、有扎實的Java語言基礎；熟悉Android 或 iOS框架及SDK，熟悉物件導向程式設計，理解設計模式等。3、熟悉 Android 或 iOS 內部和底層的框架結構 。4、兼具HTML5開發經驗者優先。【其他要求說明】1.手機系統開發經驗，開發過一兩款成熟產品。2.熟悉下列之相關技術優先：Java scripts, AJAX, JQuery, CSS。3.熟悉C++/C#/php語言優先考慮。4.了解 android 或 iOS 系統源碼優先考慮。5. 精通 C++6. 對網路與行動網路事業有熱情

job_lists.other_condition: 竭誠歡迎對於安全分析軟體、滲透測試與虛擬化 (hypervisor) 技術有經驗的您，加入團隊；若您具備以下能力，歡迎您來嘗試基本條件:1.資訊工程（相關科系）碩士(含以上)2. 有使用 C、C++、C#、ASM、Java (其中一項) 與 Scrum 敏捷開發方法的經驗3. 熟悉軟體漏洞、攻擊手法（包含利用漏洞、偵測和修復的方法），並了解 open source 軟體安全套件的實作方法，例如：Nmap、Nessus、Metaspolit project、Volatility framework、LLVM、IDA Pro、Kali Linux 等加分條件:1. 了解最新的加密技術，與其應用於認證、授權、訊息完整性與不可抵賴性等的工作知識2. 熟悉 TCP/IP 網路協定，與相關的安全協定，如：IPSec、SSL、HTTPS 等3. 對關聯性資料庫技術（如：SQL、MySQL、SQLite 等）和網頁技術（HTML/CSS、AJAX、XML/Web services）有基本了解4. 熟悉 Symbolic execution 或 Fuzzing 技術*請檢附相當於TOEIC 650分之英語測驗成績證明(具外國學歷或正式工作經歷者可免)，如無法提供，將安排參加本院英文檢測

job_lists.company: 工研院 _財團法人工業技術研究院
job_lists.content: 1.使用、了解並修改 open source 或商業的軟體安全套件，且整合成一套新穎的軟體安全解決方案2.設計、實作並測試針對智慧裝置、嵌入式系統和物聯網裝置的軟體安全方案3.分析、檢閱並測試現存的軟體安全方案設計和實作，鑑定這些方案的弱點，且加強它們的安全強度4.提供新的與現存的軟體安全系統的架構、設計與程式設計等技術文件5.時時跟上了解、提供並實行安全程式設計的最佳實踐指南
job_lists.other_condition: 竭誠歡迎對於安全分析軟體、滲透測試與虛擬化 (hypervisor) 技術有經驗的您，加入團隊；若您具備以下能力，歡迎您來嘗試基本條件:1.資訊工程（相關科系）碩士(含以上)2. 有使用 C、C++、C#、ASM、Java (其中一項) 與 Scrum 敏捷開發方法的經驗3. 熟悉軟體漏洞、攻擊手法（包含利用漏洞、偵測和修復的方法），並了解 open source 軟體安全套件的實作方法，例如：Nmap、Nessus、Metaspolit project、Volatility framework、LLVM、IDA Pro、Kali Linux 等加分條件:1. 了解最新的加密技術，與其應用於認證、授權、訊息完整性與不可抵賴性等的工作知識2. 熟悉 TCP/IP 網路協定，與相關的安全協定，如：IPSec、SSL、HTTPS 等3. 對關聯性資料庫技術（如：SQL、MySQL、SQLite 等）和網頁技術（HTML/CSS、AJAX、XML/Web services）有基本了解4. 熟悉 Symbolic execution 或 Fuzzing 技術*請檢附相當於TOEIC 650分之英語測驗成績證明(具外國學歷或正式工作經歷者可免)，如無法提供，將安排參加本院英文檢測
